Madame Alima, 1ère de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo, excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle est très sollicitée dans le village de Tamaro et environnants. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 paniers de choux pommés, 2 paniers d’aubergines, un sac d’oignon,  2 cartons de maggi  et 1 kilo de poivre à San, auprès des grossistes. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant, en détail et à crédit à une clientèle mixte. 
Avec ce prêt, elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 12.500 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et aider son conjoint dans la prise en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
For the most part married in traditional extended families, the four women of the group BEN average 37 years of age and four children each. The women all live in the village of Tamaro, in Region de Ségou (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali), and they know one another through ties of community, commerce, and kinship. They buy and sell vegetables, condiments, etc. 

With the goal of satisfying their burgeoning customer base, the group members decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan. 

Ms. Alima, standing first from the left in the photo, excels at selling condiments. She is much in demand in and around the village of Tamaro. She intends to use her loan in San in order to purchase 5 baskets of savoy cabbage, 2 baskets of eggplant, a sack of onions, 2 boxes of Maggi, and a kilo of black pepper, from wholesale merchants. She makes her sales retail, accepting cash or credit from a mixed customer base. 

With this loan, she hopes to make an average monthly profit of 12,500 francs CFA that will be reinvested in her business and used to help her husband in meeting household needs.

loans.use: to purchase condiments to sell

loans.name: Tièssiri 3 Group

texts.fr:
Les neufs femmes du groupe Tièssiri 3 sont mariés majoritairement dans des grandes familles traditionnelles avec en moyenne 33 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans le village de Siradjankoro dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de mariage et de voisinage. Dans le but de s’approvisionner en intrants et d’utiliser la main d’œuvre masculine pour réaliser le labour et les travaux d’entretien, elles ont fait recours à Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt de campagne. Les membres du groupe vont cultiver l’arachide, le mil, le gombo, le fonio et le niébé.
Madame Binta (femme Assise en 1ère position sur la photo de la droite vers la gauche) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 1 sac d’engrais, faire le labour et le désherbage de ses champs. Elle se ravitaille en main d’œuvre avec l’association des jeunes  et en intrants agricoles au grand marché de Ségou. Avec une superficie de 1,5 hectare, elle espère produire 12 sacs d’arachide et 3 sacs de mil.  Une partie de la production serait vendue pour gérer les petites dépenses du foyer au quotidien tandis que le reste serait auto consommée en famille.
texts.en:
The nine members of the group Tièssiri 3 are for the most part married in large traditional families, and they average 33 years of age and 3 children each all living in the village of Siradjankoro, in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, marriage, and community. 

With the goal of stocking up on farm inputs and using male labor for carrying out the upkeep work, they turned toward the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second farm loan cycle. The group members are going to grow peanuts, millet, okra, 'fonio', and black-eyed peas.  

Ms. Binta (the woman seated first from the right in the photo) intends to use her loan to purchase a sack of fertilizer and have the plowing and weeding done on her fields. She supplies herself with labor from the association of young people, and as for the farm inputs, from the big market of Ségou.  

With a land area of 1.5 hectares, she hopes to produce 12 sacks of peanuts and 3 sacks of millet. Part of the produce will be sold to manage sundry day-to-day household expenses, while the rest will be consumed by the family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cover the cost of male labor for plowing and weeding

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre femmes du groupe Benkadi sont mariées majoritairement dans des ménages polygamiques avec en moyenne 40 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le village de Dona dans la  commune rurale de Cinzana gare dans la région de Ségou (4ème Région administrative du Mali). Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de mariage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de bois de chauffe, de charbon de bois et du riz. Dans le but de se ravitailler au comptant, les membres du groupe ont adhéré è Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 7ème  prêt solidaire.
Madame Sata (Seule femme assise sur la photo) est connue dans le village et  environnants pour la vente des céréales de qualité. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 5 sacs de riz. Elle se ravitaille en riz à la foire de Cinzana Gare et parfois à Ségou avec les forains de Niono (zone office du Niger). La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit à domicile à une clientèle composée majoritairement d’hommes. Madame Sata espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40 000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité, prendre en charge les besoins du foyer et l’entretien des enfants. Elle ambitionne devenir grossiste dans la vente des céréales dans ce partenariat avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The four women of the group Benkadi are for the most part married in polygamous households who average 40 years of age and four children each. The women all live in the village of Dona, in Commune Rurale de Cinzana Gare, in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another through ties of kinship and marriage. The group members have small businesses involving charcoal and rice.

With the aim of resupplying themselves by using cash, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their seventh solidarity loan. 

Ms. Sata (the only woman seated in the photo) is known in and around the village for selling quality grains. She intends to use her loan to purchase 5 sacks of rice. She resupplies herself with rice at the Cinzana Gare fair and sometimes in Ségou from the fair-goers of Niono (Zone Office du Niger). Retail sales are made in cash or on credit from her home. Her customer base is composed mostly of men. 

With this loan, Ms. Sata hopes to make an average monthly profit of 40,000 francs CFA that will be used for reinvesting in business, to meet household needs, and to care for the children. Her ambition is to become a wholesale merchant selling grains in this partnership with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to purchase rice to sell

loans.name: Yaya

texts.fr:
Né vers 1980 à Lofigué cercle de Kadiolo, Yaya vit avec ses 3 enfants et ses deux  femmes dans une famille traditionnelle à Kolondièba. 
Monsieur  Yaya est enseignant de son État, à coté de son emploi, il s’intéresse aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de carburants et lubrifiants et s’approvisionne à Nièna.  Il est très apprécié et sollicité à Kolondièba et environs.  
Nanti de 5 années d’expériences dans le domaine, Yaya dans ses recherches de ressources financières complémentaires, décide de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso avec qui il est à son  premier  prêt. 
Yaya compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 5 fûts de carburant et 50 bidons d’huile 
Yaya espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 150.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les affaires.
texts.en:
Born around 1980 in Lofigué, in Cercle de Kadiolo, Mr. Yaya lives with his three children and two wives in a traditional family in Kolondièba. He is a teacher. Aside from his job, he became interested in revenue-generating businesses, especially the buying and selling of fuels and lubricants. He gets his supplies in Nièna. He is much in demand and appreciated in and around Kolondièba. 

Bestowed with five years of experience in this domain, Mr. Yaya decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in his search for financial resources. He is now on his first loan. 

He intends to use his loan to purchase 5 drums of fuel and 50 cans of oil. Mr. Yaya hopes to make a monthly profit of 150,000 francs CFA that will be used to meet family needs, repay the loan, and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase fuel to sell

loans.name: Bourama

texts.fr:
Né vers 1982 à Bangoua, Bourama vit avec  1 enfant et sa femme dans une famille traditionnelle  à Kolondièba. 
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école pour des raisons sociales, Monsieur  Bourama s’est vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de carburants et lubrifiants et s’approvisionne à Nièna.  Il est très apprécié et sollicité à Kolondièba et environs.  
Nanti de 5 années d’expériences dans le domaine, Bourama dans ses recherches de ressources financières complémentaires, décide de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso avec qui il est à son  premier  prêt. 
Bourama compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 2 fûts de carburant et 20 bidons d’huile 
Bourama espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 40.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les affaires.
texts.en:
Born around 1982 in Bangoua, Bourama now resides in Kolondièba, and lives in a traditional family with his wife and one child.

Not having had the opportunity to attend school - and this for social reasons - Bourama quickly developed an interest in income-generating activities, particularly in selling and buying fuels and lubricants, which he purchases in Nièna.  He enjoys a good reputation and receives a high demand from his customers in Kolondièba and its surroundings.

Having worked in this field for five years already and looking for additional financial resources, Bourama has decided to join Soro Yiriwaso.  This is his first loan.

He will use his loan to buy two barrels of fuel and twenty cans of oil.

He is expecting monthly profits to reach 40,000 CFA francs.  These profits will be used to meet his family's needs, repay his loan and reinvest in business.

loans.use: to buy some fuel.

loans.name: Benkelema Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les dix femmes du groupe  BENKELEMA ont  en moyenne 44 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Cinzara dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de mariage et de parenté. Elles font essentiellement de la restauration et l’achat vente de condiments alimentaires. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  2 eme  prêt solidaire.
Madame Dounaba (1ère debout à gauche sur la photo) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 50 kilogrammes de riz et les ingrédients nécessaires pour sa restauration auprès des commerçants de la ville de San. Elle fait sa restauration à la foire hebdomadaire du village, où elle est très appréciée et sollicitée de  sa clientèle, diverse et variée, pour la qualité de ses plats alimentaires. 
Avec ce prêt,  elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All of them married in traditional extended families, the ten women of the group BENKELEMA average 44 years of age and five children each. The women all live in the village of Cinzara, in Region de Ségou (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali), and they know one another through ties of community, marriage, and kinship. They essentially work in food service and in the buying and selling of condiments.

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second solidarity loan. 

Ms. Dounaba (standing first from the left in the photo) intends to use her loan to purchase 50 kg of rice and the ingredients necessary for cooking. She buys from merchants from the village of San. She makes her meals at the weekly village fair, where she is much in demand and appreciated by her diverse and varied customer base for the quality of her dishes. 

With this loan, she hopes to make an average monthly profit of 15,000 francs CFA that will be reinvested in her business and used to meet household needs.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making meals

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr:
Toutes mariées dans des familles traditionnelles élargies, les femmes du groupe Djiguiya ont  en moyenne  38 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes le village de Cinzara dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font la restauration, la vente de lait sous toutes ses formes et  de légumes. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe  intègrent  Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur  1er prêt solidaire.
Madame  Assitan (3 eme femme debout de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 75 litres de lait frais auprès des coopératives des éleveurs de San. Après avoir bouillie le lait, elle le revend au comptant, en détail quelques fois à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, elle espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 10.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge des besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
All married in extended traditional families, the women who compose the DJIGUIYA group are, on average, 38 years old, with four children each. They all live in the village of Cinzara, in the Segou region (fourth administrative region of Mali), and they know each other through neighborhood and family ties. They prepare meals, sell various forms of milk, and vegetables.

In order to boost their businesses, the members of the group have joined Soro Yiriwaso, and this is their first solidarity loan.

Assitan (in the standing row, third from the left) is planning to use her loan to buy 75 liters of fresh milk from breeders' associations in the town of San.  After boiling the milk, she resells it for cash or sometimes on credit, to a retail group of customers consisting of men and women.

With this loan, she is expecting average monthly profits to reach 10,000 CFA francs. She will use her profits to reinvest in her activity and to meet some of her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Tièssiri  1 Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des grandes familles traditionnelles avec en moyenne 41 ans et 4 enfants par femme, les neufs  membres du groupe Tièssiri 1 vivent toutes dans le village de Siradjankoro dans la région de Ségou (4ème région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de mariage et de voisinage. Dans le but d’utiliser la main d’œuvre masculine pour réaliser le labour et les travaux d’entretien, elles ont fait recours à Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt de campagne. Les membres du groupe vont cultiver l’arachide, le mil, le gombo, le fonio et le niébé.
Madame Djènèba (femme debout en 2ème position sur la photo de la droite vers la gauche) compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 2 sacs d’engrais, faire le labour et le désherbage de ses champs. Elle se ravitaille en en main d’œuvre avec l’association des jeunes  et en intrants agricoles au grand marché de Ségou. Avec une superficie de 2 hectares, elle espère produire, 12 sacs d’arachide, 3 sacs de mil et une trentaine de tasse de gombo. La production du gombo et une partie de celle du mil et d’arachide seront vendus pour gérer les petites dépenses du foyer au quotidien tandis que le reste serait auto consommée en famille.
texts.en:
For the most part married women in large traditional families and averaging 41 years of age and four children each, the nine members of the group Tièssiri 1 all live in the village of Siradjankoro, in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women know one another through ties of kinship, marriage, and community. 

With the goal of utilizing male labor for carrying out the upkeep work, they turned toward the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their second farm loan cycle. The group members are going to grow peanuts, millet, okra, 'fonio', and black-eyed peas.  

Ms. Djènèba (the second woman standing from the right in the photo) intends to use her loan to purchase 2 sacks of fertilizer and to have the plowing and weeding done on her fields. She supplies herself with labor from the association of young people, and as for the farm inputs, from the big market of Ségou.  

With a land area of 2 hectares, she hopes to produce 12 sacks of peanuts, 3 sacks of millet, and about 30 basins of okra. The okra and part of the millet and peanuts produced will be sold to manage sundry day-to-day family expenses, while the rest will be consumed by the family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cover the cost of plowing

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
Aquilina de 41 años, es una mujer seria. Vive en compañía de Eliazar, su esposo desde hace 20 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Kelvin y Lizbeth, a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Mientras que su esposo trabaja como peón en una fábrica de ladrillos, donde la pagan por cada millar que realiza. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganados, pues es ahí donde obtiene mejores ganancias. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de ovejas, toros y vacas muy pequeños, a quienes cuida y alimenta para luego venderlos en las ferias locales de la ciudad, ya tiene mucho tiempo de experiencia. Cuenta que cotiza muy bien sus reses y si no le pagan lo que solicita los regresa a su casa para seguir alimentándolos y así obtener la próxima vez una mejor ganancia. “no puedo rematar los animales, tengo que ser inteligente”, afirma. Ahora desea junto a su esposo alquilar un terreno amplio para poner su fábrica de ladrillos y así pueda trabajar para algo propio y no para otras personas. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi banco” y este es el crédito número 12 con MFP, donde agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues los integrantes de su asociación son responsables y solidarios.
Aquilina, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de ovejas en cantidad.
texts.en:
41-year-old Aquilina is a responsible woman.  She lives in the company of Eliazar, her spouse of twenty years.  They have two children, Kelvin and Lizbeth, to whom they look after in their own home.  While her husband works as a laborer in a brick factory, where pay is based on each unit of a thousand produced, she engages in the purchase and sale of livestock [and] earns better profits.  Her work consists of purchasing very young sheep, bulls, and cows.  She [then] looks after and feeds them [for the purpose of] selling them at the local markets in [her] city.  She already has a great deal of experience [in this field of work].

She says that she is well paid for her animals and if she is not paid her asking price she will bring her animals back home and continue feeding them.  That way, she will earn a better profit the next time.  "I can't sell off the animals [too] cheaply; I have to be smart," she says.  Now, she would like to rent a spacious area of land together with her husband to use for his [own] brick factory.  That would enable him to work for something of his own and not for other people.  

She is a member of the communal bank "Mi Banco."  This is her twelfth loan with [field partner] MFP, where thanks to the support of all of you, she will be able to obtain the credit that she needs to achieve her objectives.  She is also committed to paying her payments on their due date, as [all] the members of her [communal bank] are responsible and supportive.  Aquilina will invest the requested money in the purchase of a large quantity of sheep.

loans.use: to purchase sheep.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, de 21 años es un hombre responsable y trabajador. Vive en compañía de su abuela y tía en la casa que heredaron hace 10 años. Él es un hombre responsable, todas las mañanas cuida de los animales que pronto venderá en la feria ganadera que se realiza todos los fines de semana. Tiene muchos años de experiencia, pues según comenta desde niño su padre le enseño el negocio, ahora lo realiza de manera independiente, es decir su trabajo consiste en la compra de animales como vacas, ovejas, cuyes y gallos de pelea, los cuales cuida durante la semana para vender los días domingos en la feria. Gusta mucho del negocio, pues le permite perfeccionarse en la crianza de animales, “sobre todo me gusta cuidar de los gallos de pelea, los entreno para peleas”, comenta. Ahora desea seguir en este trabajo perfeccionar su habilidad y ser uno de los mejores. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 2 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Luis, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar su ganado.
texts.en:
Luis is 21 years old, is a responsible man, and hard-working. He lives with his grandmother and his aunt in the house they inherited ten years ago. He is a responsible man, every morning takes care of the animals that he will sell in the cattle fair held every weekend. He has many years of experience, and according to him, his father taught him the business since he was a child. 

Today, he does it independently. In order words, his work consists in the purhcase of animals such as cows, sheep, guinea pigs, and fighting cocks, which he takes care of during the week to sell on Sundays at the fair. He likes the business very much, because it allows him to improve in raising animals, "especially I like to take care of the fighting cocks, I train them to fight", he states. 

Now he wants to continue in this work, improve his skills and be one of the best. He belongs to the solidarity group "Acraquia", and this is the loan number two with MFP. During this time, he obtained a lot of benefits, for this reason he is grateful for the support of his association, where people are responsible and supportive. For this reason, he promises to be punctual on his payments.

Luis will invest the requested money in the purchase of a dairy cow to increase his livestock.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dough sheeter to mix in yeast, two tables, five bags of flour, butter, 100 pounds of sugar, and yeast.

loans.name: Griselda Del Socorro

texts.es: La joven Griselda de la edad de 24 años, labora para una pizzería como recepcionista aproximadamente 2 años, es soltera no tiene hijos aún. Está solicitando apoyo con su primer crédito a AFODENIC y KIVA, para mejorar las condiciones de la cocina de la casa de su mamá ya que se encuentra en muy malas condiciones y ella desea ayudar a su madre para ello necesita comprar, cemento, arena bloques piedrines, hierro zinc, alambre de amarre, tablones de soporte para el concreto y el pago de la mano de obra. Agradece muchísimo el apoyo que le brinden ya que es muy importante para ella y su madre vivir en mejores circunstancias.
texts.en:
Griselda is 24 years old and has worked in a pizzeria as a receptionist for about two years. She is single and does not have children yet. 

She is asking for help with her first loan through AFONDENIC and Kiva in order to improve the condition of the kitchen in her mother's house, since right now it is in very bad shape. She would like to help her mom, and to do so she needs to buy cement, sand, stone blocks, zinc metal, tie wire, support beams for the concrete, and pay for the cost of labor. 

She is very grateful for the help that she has been given, since it is very important that she and her mother live in better circumstances.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stone blocks, zinc metal, tie wire, support beams for the concrete and pay for the cost of labor

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, de 64 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de su esposo Julián, con quien convive desde hace 40 años. Ambos tienen 9 hijos, pero solo vive con uno de ellos: Víctor, al que cuida en la casa que compraron hace 40 años. La zona donde vive Julia es ganadera, ahí todos sus pobladores se dedican a la crianza de ganado vacuno de buena calidad. Ella comenzó desde hace 20 años aproximadamente, a incursionar en la ganadería con la crianza de vacas. Ahora tiene 5 vacas lecheras y 3 becerros, que le brindan leche, con los que elabora queso; un promedio de 18 “bolillos”, diarios (quesos pequeños). Junto a su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Sus principales sembríos constan de papa, habas, alverja y maíz los cuales cuida con mucho esmero, pues depende de sus cuidados las ganancias que obtendrá en la cosecha. Asimismo comenta que comenzó a incursionar en la crianza de gallos de pelea. Ahora su objetivo se centra en la mejora de sus sembríos y de sus animales, con trabajo y empeño sabe que lo conseguirá. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 6 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos.
Julia, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca de raza Brown Swiss, que le brindan buena leche y si el dinero le alcanza comprará fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Julia, 64, is a responsible woman. She lives with her husband Julian, whom she has been living with for 40 years. They have 9 children but only live with one of them, Victor, who takes care of them in the house they bought 40 years ago. Julia lives in a cattle farming area; there all the inhabitants work breeding quality cattle. She began approximately 20 years ago, venturing in cattle farming, breeding cows. She now has 5 dairy cows and 3 calves that provide milk, with which she produces cheese; an average of 18 “bolillos” (small cheese) daily. Together with her husband they work in farming. Their main crops consist of potatoes, beans, peas and corn with which they take great care, as their profits depend on the care they give to their harvest. Also, she says that she began breeding fighting cocks. Her focus now is on improving their crops and their animals; with work and determination she knows she will achieve it. 

She belongs to the group Solidarity “Accraquia” and this is loan number 6 with MFP. During this time she was able to obtain many benefits and for that she is grateful for the support of her association, where the people are responsible and supportive, and for this reason she promises to be punctual with the payments.

Julia will invest the money requested to purchase a Brown Swiss cow that provides good milk. And if there is enough money, she will buy natural fertilizer to spread among their crops.

loans.use: to buy a Brown Swiss cow and fertilizer.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, de 46 años es una mujer valiente. Vive en una casa alquilada desde hace 2 años en compañía de sus 3 hijas, a las que quiere mucho. Desde hace 5 años se dedica a realizar bordados artesanales, se inicio por invitación de una de sus amigas que le enseñó, ahora ella realiza trabajos de bordados en la comodidad de su casa para poder atender su hogar y a sus hijos, también cultiva alfalfa para poder venderla al por mayor una vez que los arbustos estén maduros. Es por ello que no tiene un horario fijo de trabajo, pero es muy constante en la realización de sus bordados  ya que  por la complejidad del trabajo y el grosor del bordado en la tela, dura hasta un mes de realizado como resultado se da una bella prenda  típica  que causa admiración en sus clientes y finalmente son los que compran al contado. La época más rentable  en su negocio es cuando  están en plena época de festividades típicas llamadas la fiesta del Santiago en honro a los animales y que se celebra mucho por su zona. Desea crecer en su producción de faldas bordadas y contratar a personas apara ayudarla en esta  producción. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Mujeres Victorianas” y este es el crédito número 7 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  tener un apoyo financiero, ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Victoria; invertirá el dinero en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para nutrir sus sembríos de alfalfa, además comprará hilos y telas para sus bordados.
texts.en:
Victoria, age 46, is a courageous woman. She has lived in a rental home for two years along with her three children, whom she loves very much. 

For five years she has made handcrafted embroidery; she started after being invited by one of her friends, who taught her how to do it. Now she does embroidery jobs in the comfort of her own home, so that she can take care of her house and children. She also grows alfalfa to sell wholesale once the bushes are mature. For these reasons she does not have a fixed work schedule, but she is very steadfast in the creation of her embroidery. Due to the complexity of the work and the thickness of the embroidery on the fabric, it takes up to a month to complete. As a result she produces a beautiful, traditional garment that draws admiration from her customers, and finally these are bought in cash. 

The most profitable time in her business is during the full season of festivities, typically called the Festival of Santiago in honor of the animals, and which is much celebrated in the region. She wants to increase her production of embroidered skirts and hire people to help her with this work. 

She belongs to the united group "Mujeres Victorianas" [Victorian Women] and this is their seventh loan with MFP. She is very happy to have financial support, and has always demonstrated responsibility in her payments. Furthermore, she appreciates being part of a community bank because all of its members are responsible and supportive people. 

Victoria will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers to nourish her alfalfa fields; additionally she will buy thread and fabric for her embroidery.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers, as well as thread and fabric.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan tiene 28 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene un hijo. Él siempre ha trabajado con ganado, por que su madre trabaja en esa actividad. Antes Juan era empleado, pero hoy en día se dedica a comercializar con ganado. Él visita las plazas de ganado, que están lejos de su casa, la plaza más cercana esta a cuarenta minutos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es, para comprar cinco terneros pequeños, para engordarlos en el invierno y venderlos gordos al final del verano. De esta manera, podrá rotar más seguido la compra y venta de los animales, obteniendo un mejor margen de ganancias para brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia y para estar preparado para las enfermedades que padece su hijo, que no le falta nada.
texts.en:
Juan is 28 years old, he lives with his partner and he has a son. He has always worked with livestock because his mother works in this activity. Juan used to be an employee but nowadays he makes a living commercializing cattle. He visits the livestock markets that are far away from his home. The closest market is forty minutes away. 

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to purchase five little calves to fatten them during the winter and sell them fattened at the end of the summer. This way he will be able to rotate the purchase and sale of cattle often and obtain a better margin of earnings to better the quality of life of his family, be prepared for the illnesses his son suffers and provide him with everything he needs.

loans.use: to purchase five little calves.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 53 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de Humberto, su esposo desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo vive con uno de ellos: Nelson a quien educa en su casa propia. Gracias a su  trabajo pudo comprar un ómnibus con el que  realiza transporte público cubriendo las ruta de Huancayo hacia la cuidad de Jauja, ahí su esposo se dedica a administrar su negocio. Por su parte ella se dedica al cuidado de ovejas, las cuales cuida con mucho esmero y alimenta constantemente, pues depende de ello, su venta en el mercado de carnes de la ciudad. “Con la venta de carne obtengo más ingresos, además me gusta mucho”, afirma Yolanda, quien también se abrió una tienda de comestibles en su casa, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, “ahí el dinero no circula, tienes que comprar alimentos que se venderán en 2 o 3 días”, afirma, por ello necesita dinero para poder capitalizar su negocio, no puede mezclar los ingresos ya que según sus propias palabras, cada negocio tiene su propio capital de trabajo. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nueva vida” y este es el crédito número 9 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias. Yolanda; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestible como: arroz, azúcar y bebidas de todo tipo.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 53, is a responsible woman. She lives with Humberto, her husband of 30 years. They have four children, although only one lives with them: Nelson, whom she educates at home.

Thanks to their work, they were able to buy a bus, which he uses for public transport, covering the route from Huancayo to the city of Jaula. Her husband works managing this business. She works caring for sheep. She painstakingly cares for them and feeds them constantly, since her sales in the city’s meat market depends on this. “With the sale from the meat, I get more income, and I also enjoy it,” says Yolanda, who also opened a food store in her home, where she sells basic goods. “There money doesn’t circulate. You have to buy foods that will sell in two or three days.” Because of this, she needs money to capitalize her business. She cannot mix her different incomes, because according to her, each business has its own working capital.

She belongs to the solidarity group “Nueva Vida” and this is her 9th credit with the MFP, where she feels she has developed, since she has the help to move forward with her business. For this reason, she promises to make her payments on time. She also likes to work in her association because they are responsible and supportive people. Yolando will invest the money in purchasing staples for her food store, such as rice, sugar, and all kinds of drinks.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and drinks.

loans.name: Faratimagne Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des ménages polygamiques, les six  femmes du groupe Faratimagne ont une moyenne d’âge de 32 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le village de Dona dans la  commune rurale de Cinzana gare dans la région de Ségou (4ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de mariage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le village. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de  riz, pâtes alimentaires, jus locaux, bois de chauffe et charbon de bois. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont  décidé de collaborer avec  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 7ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Bintou (femme assise en tee-shirt vert) est une grande vendeuse de charbon de bois dans le village et ses environs. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 30 sacs de charbon de bois. Elle se ravitaille en charbon avec les exploitants du village et des villages environnants. La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit à domicile et au bord du goudron au village à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame Bintou espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15 000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les besoins du foyer en condiments. A l’instar des autres membres du groupe, elle a pour objectif de pérenniser son activité dans cette relation avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
For the most part married in polygamous households, the six women of the group Faratimagne average 32 years of age and four children each. The women all live in the village of Dona, in Commune Rurale de Cinzana Gare, in the Ségou region (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). They know one another through ties of marriage and their revenue-generating work in the village. The group members have small businesses involving rice, pasta, local drinks, firewood, and charcoal. 

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their seventh solidarity loan. 

Ms. Bintou (the woman sitting and wearing a green t-shirt) is a major charcoal vendor in and around the village. She intends to use her loan to purchase 30 sacks of charcoal. She resupplies herself with charcoal from village producers and from surrounding villages. Retail sales are made in cash or on credit from her home and on the roadside in the village. The customers are composed of men and women. 

With this loan, Ms. Bintou hopes to make an average monthly profit of 15,000 francs CFA that will be reinvested in business and used to meet household needs in terms of food. Just like the other members of the group, she has the goal of sustaining her business in this relationship with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell

loans.name: Tunu

texts.en:
Tunu, 35 years old, is a permanent resident of the village of Muniguda, in the Rayagada district of Odisha, India. She has a five-member family comprised of her husband and three sons who are about 18, 16 & 13 years old. The two younger sons are attending school in the village while the elder son is helping in his father’s carpentry business. Tunu has been running a business making and selling leaf plates with the financial support of Mahashakti for six months. From the above business, she is earning a monthly income of Rs 8,000/- .

In the year 2012, Tunu attended a water and sanitation awareness meeting of Mahashakti Foundation and came to know about the bad effects of ODF (Out Side Defecation). From a statistic, it is known that the rural coverage of toilet facilities in Odisha is only 7% in comparison to the national coverage of 22%. This coverage in this locality is only 3 to 4 %, which is very shocking. Tunu realizes the situation with the frequent illness of the family members and regular medical expenses. Tunu is planning to construct a toilet with this Rs 20,000/- loan and make her family safe from many health hazards. Tunu will be the 15th women to have a toilet facility in the family out of the 65 households in her slum. Now she feels very proud.

loans.use: To pay for constructing a toilet

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
Edith, de 37 años es una valiente madre de familia. Vive en la casa que alquiló hace 16 años, ahí forjó a sus hijos: Stefany, Nasha y Juliana, que son su razón de vivir. Su principal ingreso económico se centra en la venta de queso y leche al por mayor, ya tiene muchos años dedicándose a este negocio  por lo que tiene mucha demanda. Durante los primeros días del mes compra varios moldes de queso entre los ganaderos, asimismo leche por litros. Después de adquirir lo suficiente, viaja a la ciudad más cercana por una hora y media. Después lleva los alimentos a sus clientes quienes ya anteriormente realizan los pedidos. “Me va muy bien en mi trabajo, pues la leche y queso que se producen en mi pueblo, son de calidad y sabor diferente, por esa razón tengo muchos clientes”, comenta, es así que Edith viaja cada 15 días para realizar su negocio. Ahora ella desea viajar a las ciudades de la Oroya y Lima, para expandir su negocio. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 7 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos.
Edith, invertirá el dinero en la compra de mercadería entre quesos y leche por cantidad para su comercialización.
texts.en:
Edith, 37 years old, is a brave mother. She has been living in a rented house for 16 years. There she brought up her children: Stefany, Nasha, and Juliana. They are her reason for living.

Her main financial income is focused on selling cheese and milk at wholesale. She has been in this business for many years as there is so much demand. During the first days of the month she buys various cheese in molds from the farmers and milk by the liter.

After buying a sufficient amount, she travels 1-1/2 hours to the nearest city. Later she takes the food to her customers who have already placed orders.  “I’m doing very well in my work, as the milk and cheese are produced in my village, and they are high quality with a distinctive taste and this is why I have many customers,” she says. And so Edith travels every 15 days to conduct her business.

Now she wants to travel to the cities of Oroya and Lima in order to expand her business. She belongs to the communal bank Acraquia and this is her 7th loan through MFP. During this time she obtained many benefits, for which she is grateful to the association, where people are trustworthy and united, and she promises for this reason to be punctual making her payments.

Edith, will invest the money in the purchase of merchandise of cheese and milk in quantity for sale.

loans.use: to buy quality cheese and milk with a distinctive flavor from the farmers in her village to sell in cities further away

loans.name: Diana

texts.es: Clelia, de 51 años vive con sus 2 hijos y sus padres en su casa donde nació. Desde hace 5 años decidió generar su propia fuente de trabajo. Fue así que compró una fotocopiadora  en un pequeño espacio que alquilo en el centro de la ciudad, muy  cercana a varias instituciones educativas  en donde tiene más afluencia de clientes.  Todas las mañanas se dirige  a su espacio para dedicarse a sacar copias de los pedidos que le hacen, de esta manera consigue las rentas necesarias de cada día para su familia, en algunas ocasiones sus hijos la apoyan, afirma que lo que le agrada de su trabajo es que es por horas y además de ser muy rentables  aunque en algunas ocasiones su máquina requiere de  mantenimiento mecánico que puede retrasarse en varios días, su meta es tener  una maquina más  efectiva  que le permita ahorrar el tiempo en  el servicio de fotocopiado que brinda. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nueva Vida” y este es el crédito número 11 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias. Clelia, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de hojas por millares y abastecimiento de toner (tinta) la fotocopiadora que tiene.
texts.en:
Clelia is 51, and lives with her two children and her parents in the house where she was born. Five years ago, she decided to create her own source of work. This was how she came to buy a photocopier for a small space she rented in the center of the city, very close to several educational institutions, where she gets a greater influx of customers. 

Every morning she heads to her space to work taking copies for the orders placed with her. This is how she earns the day to day income she needs for her family. Sometimes her children help her. 

She says that what she likes about her work is that it is by the hour, besides being very profitable, even though sometimes her machine needs mechanical maintenance that can be delayed for several days. Her goal is to have a more effective machine that will allow her to save time in the photocopying service she offers. 

She belongs to the “Nueva Vida” solidarity group, and this is her 11th loan with MFP, where she feels fulfilled, as she gets the help to progress in her business. So she promises to make her installment payments on time. In addition, she likes to work in her group as they are responsible and supportive people. Clelia will use the money applied for to purchase sheets of paper by the thousand, and for supplying the photocopier she has with toner (ink).

loans.use: To buy paper and toner.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: Esteban, de 58 años, es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de sus sobrinas y padres, en la casa donde nació. Gran parte de su vida la dedicó al trabajo y cuidado de sus padres los cuales son ancianos todavía. Su principal ingreso económico por 45 años aproximadamente, se centra en el cuidado de abejas de las cuales extrae miel, tiene un promedio de 18 cajones de panal, las cuales cuida diariamente, “depende mucho del espacio y la calidad de atención para que produzcan una buena miel”, comenta. Todos estos años de experiencia le ayudaron a mejorar las técnicas de apicultura, por esa razón tiene muchos clientes a quienes vende la miel que produce, “las principales ventas son en la ciudad de Huancayo”, afirma. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de miel, por lo que está pensando comprar abejas reinas de calidad para lograr su objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “san miguel de huallhua” y este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Esteban, invertirá el dinero en la compra de bastidores, ceras y ligas para la crianza de abejas.
texts.en:
Esteban, who is 58, is a hard-working man. He lives with his nieces and his parents in the house where he was born. He has dedicated a great part of his life to working and caring for his parents, who are elderly. His main income for approximately 45 years has come from caring for bees that produce honey. He has an average of 18 hives of honeycombs, which he cares for daily. "It depends a lot on the space and the quality of attention so that they produce good honey," he comments. All these years of experience helped him to improve his beekeeping techniques. For this reason he has many customers to whom he sells the honey he produces. "The main sales are n the city of Huancayo," he confirms. Now he wants to improve the quality of the honey, and for this he is thinking of buying quality queen bees to achieve his objectives. 

He belongs to the communal bank "San Miguel de Huallhua," and this is his 8th loan with MFP. During this time he was able to obtain many benefits, and for that he is grateful for the support of his group, where the people are responsible and united. For this reason, he promises to be punctual in his payments. Esteban will invest the money in the purchase of frames, wax, and ties for beekeeping.

loans.use: to buy frames, wax, and ties for beekeeping

loans.name: Elba María

texts.es: Elba es una señora de 47 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos una vive fuera del país otra ya es abogada, su esposo trabajaba en el extranjero al regresar al país con sus ahorros, toman la idea de poner el negocio de una pizzería el cual les va muy bien y ya tiene seis años aproximadamente y como otro ingreso extra alquilan cuartos por lo general a estudiantes. Ahora su manera de sacar adelante el negocio y sus dos hijos que todavía están cursando la universidad, es solicitar crédito para cambiar el techo de su vivienda en vista de que esta deteriorado, por lo que necesita comprar laminas de zinc y perlines para así poder dar mejores condiciones a su casa y sus inquilinos. Ella está muy anuente a cumplir con sus metas establecidas por que desea que su familia tenga una casa digna y mejorar las condiciones de vida con la ayuda de su esposo.
texts.en: Elba is a 47 year old woman.  She has four children and one lives outside the country.  Another daughter is a lawyer.  Her husband worked outside the country and when he returned with his earnings, they got the idea to open a pizza parlor and it’s doing well.  They’ve had it for about six years and they also rent out rooms, mainly to students, to earn extra income.  Now, in order to move the business ahead, along with her two children who study at university, she is requesting a loan to that she can replace the roof in her home, because the current one has deteriorated.  She needs to buy zinc metal sheeting, and iron bars to be able to improve the conditions in her home and for the renters.  She is very willing to complete her goals because she wants her family to have a dignified home and better living conditions with her husband’s help.

loans.use: to replace her roof.

loans.name: Jorge Augusto

texts.es:
Jorge anteriormente trabajaba en un restaurante como empleado y de esta manera inició su vida laboral. Luego de muchos años comenzó a trabajar con un amigo suyo en la distribución de gaseosas, y desde hace pocos días que su compañero de trabajo dejó el negocio, Jorge ha tomado por si solo las responsabilidades del negocio. Debido a que no cuenta con mucho capital para poder surtir y ampliar sus clientes, Jorge recurre a un préstamo para comprar gaseosas al por mayor y tener surtido para vender a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y aumentar la calidad de vida de su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Su sueño es poder tener un vehículo o una moto para repartir los pedidos y también en un futuro ofrecerle educación universitaria a sus 2 hijos.
texts.en:
Jorge used to work in a restaurant and that is how he started his work life. After many years he began working with a friend distributing refreshments, and a few days ago his friend left the business and Jorge has undertaken all of the business responsibilities. Since he doesn’t have enough work capital to stock and expand his customer base, Jorge needs a loan to buy refreshments wholesale and have enough on stock to sell to his customers.

This will allow him to improve his earnings and better the quality of life of his wife and 2 children. His dream is to have a car or a motorcycle to distribute his merchandize orders and give his two children university education.

loans.use: buy refreshments wholesale.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia aprendió la actividad de la confección empíricamente trabajando en talleres y desde hace un tiempo montó su propio taller de confección en su hogar buscando mejorar la calidad de vida que le brinda a sus 3 hijos y a su esposo. Desde que tiene el taller en su hogar ha podido estar más pendiente del cuidado de sus hijos y esto ha permitido que puedan tener mejor calidad de vida en el hogar, además de que los ingresos con los que contribuye económicamente han mejorado. Gracias a que tiene trabajos de muy buena calidad, las grandes dificultades económicas que padecía la familia se han ido superando con sus ventas, y ahora que tiene la oportunidad de generar un empleo, Claudia busca un préstamo para comprar una máquina plana para brindar la herramienta de trabajo para un empleo que va a generar en su taller.

Su sueño es tener un taller de confección más grande donde pueda confeccionar todo tipo de productos.
texts.en:
Claudia learned to sew by practicing and working in workshops and some time ago she started her own tailor’s workshop in her home to have a better quality of life that she can provide her 3 children and husband. Since she started the tailoring workshop in her home she has been able to be more careful in caring for her children and has allowed her to have a better home life as well as extra income which has improved their finances. Due to the fact that she has a good quality workmanship, the great financial difficulties that the family faced have decreased as her sales have increased. Claudia now has the opportunity to create a job and needs a loan to buy a sewing machine as a work tool for a job that she will start in her workshop.

Claudia’s dream is to have a bigger tailor’s workshop where she can make all types of products.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine as a work tool.

loans.name: María Gloria

texts.es:
Doña María tiene 40 años de edad. Vive solo con sus dos hijos uno de 16 y otro de 14 años de edad respectivamente que se encuentran estudiando. Ella tiene 22 años de dedicarse a la sastrería esta muy agradecida nos comenta ya que gracias a ese oficio a mantenido a sus hijos. Ella dice, que es muy duro trabajar como costurera, a veces cuando tiene pedidos de escuelas y no tiene ayudante para avanzar sacrifica horas de sueño levantándose a las dos de la mañana para salir a tiempo en todo el día. Sus hijos le dicen “que es demasiado” porque no comprenden lo difícil que es ser madre soltera. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es, para comprar 568 zippers, 26 conos de hilo azul negro, tela, broches, marcadores, reparar su maquina de coser y cancelar una deuda con la Institución. Con la inversión, ella terminara el pedido que tiene con la escuela para que le puedan cancelar los uniformes. Ella nos comenta que desea trabajar únicamente con el negocio de la elaboración y venta de conservas, es más rentable y menos sacrificado; pero para ello debe tener a sus hijos ya bien formados.
texts.en:
Mrs. María is 40 years old, she lives with her two children, one is 16 the other is 14 years old and both are in school. She has worked as a seamstress for over 22 years and is very grateful; she says that thanks to this occupation she has been able to support her children. Mrs. María says that it is very difficult to work as a seamstress and sometimes she has orders from schools and does not have an assistant to help her get ahead. She sacrifices sleep by waking up at two in the morning to have enough time during the day. Her children say, “that is too much” because they don’t understand how difficult it is to be a single mother.

The loan that she seeks from the Fundación Campo will be used to buy 568 zippers, 26 dark blue cone threads, fabric, broaches, markers, and to make repairs to her sewing machine and cancel a debt with the institution. The investment will help her finish a work order that she has with a school so that she can get paid for the uniforms. Mrs. María says that she would only enjoy working in making and selling preserves which is more profitable and less work but in order to do that she needs to have her children all grown up.

loans.use: buy 568 zippers, 26 dark blue cone threads, fabric, broaches, markers, make repairs to her sewing machine and to cancel a debt with the institution.

loans.name: Nelly Del Socorro

texts.es:
Nelly tiene 43 años de edad, se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 17 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que estaba generando su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, decidió buscar una fuente de ingresos que le permitiera brindar en su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Fue así como inició una tienda general donde ofrece a sus clientes productos de la canasta familiar y gracias a la cual su esposo y sus 2 hijos han podido gozar de mejores condiciones de vida en el hogar. Debido a su falta de capital ha tenido que hacer un gran esfuerzo para poder ofrecer en su tienda una buena variedad de productos, y ahora que tiene la oportunidad busca un préstamo que le permita comprar productos de la canasta familiar y aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece en su tienda.

Su sueño está en brindarles el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad a sus 2 hijos y poder también ofrecer en su hogar unas mejores oportunidades económicas para salir adelante.
texts.en: Nelly is 43 years old, married and has two children who are 5 and 17 years old.  Because her husband’s income was insufficient to cover all household expenses she decided to find a source of income to be able to offer her family a better quality of life.  This is how she started a general store where she sells basic staples and thanks to which her husband and two children can enjoy better living conditions at home.  Because of the lack of capital she’s had to exert a strong effort in order to have a good variety of goods available in her store and now that she has the opportunity she’s looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy basic staples and increase the variety of goods she has in stock in her store.  Her dream is to provide her two children access to a better education and also to provide better economic opportunities at home to move forward.

loans.use: to buy basic staple goods to increase variety in her store.

loans.name: Antonio Salomon

texts.es:
Antonio inició hace unos 10 años su tienda general la cual montó con el dinero de la liquidación que le dieron al salir de una empresa donde trabajó durante 15 años. Como necesitaba generar los ingresos para el hogar donde convive con su esposa y su hijo, Antonio comenzó a buscar fuentes de ingresos y fue así como resultó montando una tienda general. Gracias a este negocio ha podido continuar ofreciéndole una buena calidad de vida a su familia y aspira a poder mejorar sus dificultades económicas; es por esto que Antonio busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes para aumentar sus ventas.

Su sueño es poder tener un negocio más grande donde pueda generar más ingresos y con el cual tenga la oportunidad de brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Antonio started his general store some 10 years ago with severance pay received when he left a company that he worked for 15 years. Since he needed to have more money to care for his home, where he lives with his wife and child, Antonio started to look for sources of income and decided to set up a general store. Thanks to this business he has been able to keep offering his family a good quality of life and hopes to improve and overcome his financial difficulties. Antonio needs a loan to buy basic household goods and to increase the variety of products that he offers his customers to increase sales.

Antonio’s dream is to have a bigger business where he can have more earnings and the opportunity to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy basic household goods and to increase the variety of products that he offers his customers to increase his sales.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén, de 62 años es un hombre vital y muy valiente. Vive en compañía de su esposa Fortunata y el menor de sus hijos, a los que cuida en la casa que compró hace 40 años. Toda una vida la dedicó al campo, comenta que desde niños sus padres le enseñaron los conocimientos de la tierra, por esa razón es la única actividad económica que desarrolla. Pero confiesa que lo que más le gusta es la ganadería, “claro sin descuidar la siembra”, afirma. Tiene numerosas vacas lecheras, las cuales cuida y alimenta en las praderas de su pueblo, todas las mañanas extra leche de sus vacas, un promedio de 35 litros diarios, que vende a un distribuidor conocido. Su mayor objetivo es aumentar la producción de leche para poder realizar más queso, pues tiene compradores que le solicitan mayores cantidades y no puede satisfacer la demanda, por esa razón espera poder concretar la compra de una vaca lechera más. Él pertenece al banco comunal “san miguel de huallhua” y este es el crédito número 1 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Rubén, invertirá el dinero en la compra de una vaca lechera para poder aumentar la producción de leche.
texts.en: Rubén is 62 years old and is a brave and vital man.  He lives with his wife, Fortunata, and the youngest of his children, both of whom he cares for in the home he bought 40 years ago.  He has dedicated his whole life to the fields and says that his parents taught him to know the land when he was very young, so this is his only way of making a living.  He tells us that he likes the livestock the best, “of course without denigrating the crops,” he says.  He has several dairy cows, which he cares for and feeds in the parries of his village.  Every morning he milks his cows and extracts 35 liters each day, then sells it to a distributor that he knows.  His main objective is to increase his milk production so that he can make more cheese.  He has buyers who have requested larger quantities of cheese and he is unable to meet the demand, so he wants to buy one more dairy cow.  He is a member of the “san miguel de huallhua” communal bank and this will be his first loan through MFP.  He has gotten many benefits and is grateful for the support from his organization, where the people are responsible and united.  He promises to be on time with his payments.  Rubén will buy a dairy cow so that he can increase his milk production.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy, de 53 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Wagner, su esposo desde hace 17 años. Ambos tienen un hijo Eduar a quien cuida en su casa que compraron hace 10 años. Su esposo es contador de profesión, juntos abrieron un estudio contable, donde brinda sus servicios. A pesar de no haber estudiado para el ejercicio, sabe mucho del tema, pues ayuda a su esposo en lo que pueda. Mientras ella se dedica a la venta de útiles de escritorio y productos de librería, en un espacio que acondicionaron al costado de la tienda. Ya tiene 16 años dedicándose a ello, no cuenta con un lugar propio, pues alquila la oficina y tienda, que se encuentran en un lugar céntrico y estratégico para poder desarrollar su negocio en todo este tiempo. Además de confiar en su hijo, quien quiere estudiar la misma carrera de su padre, como es una mujer empeñosa y muy segura de sí misma, sabe que podrá trabajar y orientar a su hijo a estudiar una carrera profesional que le ayude en el futuro y sobretodo en el negocio de sus padres. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nueva Vida” y este es el crédito número 9 con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias.
Nancy; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de millares de papeles para su librería.
texts.en:
Nancy is 53 years old and is a modest woman. She lives with Wagner, her husband for 17 years. Together, they have Eduar, their son who they take care of in the house they bought ten years ago. 

Her husband is an accountant by profession, and together they opened an accounting firm, where they offer their services. Despite not having studied for the job, she knows a lot about it, and she helps her husband in whatever she can. She is engaged in the sale of office supplies and bookstore products in a space set up next to the office. She has been dedicated to it for 16 years, but she doesn't have her own place. She rents the office and the store, which are located in a central and strategic place to develop their business. 

She trusts her son, who wants to study the same career of his father. Because she is an entrepreneur and very self-confident, she knows she will be able to work and guide her son to study a professional career that will help him in the future and, especially, in the business of their parents.

She belongs to the solidarity group "Nueva Vida" [New Life] and this is the loan number nine with MFP, where she feels developed because she gets the help to advance in her business. For this reason, she promises to be punctual with her payments. Also, she likes to work in her association because they are responsible and supportive people. Nancy will invest the requested money in the purchase of thousands of paper for her bookstore.

loans.use: to buy thousands of paper.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonal crops as dragon fruit, squash, corn, mangos, sugar beets, avocados, mandarins, pears, bananas, watermelons, peaches, melons, and all the fruits of season.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 27 años es una mujer soltera y trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su hijo Nilson en casa de sus padres, desde que nació. El trabajo que realiza Norma, es amplio, durante las mañanas cuida de sus 8 vacas, pues todavía no brindan gran cantidad de leche. Cuenta que el día ordeña un promedio de 10 litros de leche fresca, los cuales le sirven para la fabricación de queso que comercializa a los intermediarios que viven por su casa. Su trabajo lo comparte con la siembra de alfalfa, cebada, maíz, habas y papa. La alfalfa y cebada lo utiliza para la alimentación de sus animales, mientras que los demás alimentos los comercializa a la ciudad de Pampas, donde baja una vez por semana, ya que la zona donde vive Norma es rural y se ubica entre cerros y quebradas por lo que es difícil tener que transitar constantemente a la ciudad. Ahora ella desea mejorar la cantidad de producción de leche, por lo que planea comprar una vaca de calidad. Él pertenece al banco comunal “san miguel de huallhua” y este es el crédito número 6 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Norma, invertirá el dinero en la compra de una vaca lechera de buena calidad para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Norma, 27 years old, is a single and hardworking woman.  She lives in the company of her son Nilson in her parent’s house as she has since she was born.  Norma does a wide range of work.  During the mornings she takes care of 8 cows because they still don’t provide a great quantity of milk.  She says that in one day she milks an average of 10 liters of fresh milk, which serve her in the production of cheese that she sells to intermediaries who live by her house.  This work is shared with the planting of alfalfa, barley, corn, broad beans and potatoes.  She uses the alfalfa and barley to feed her animals, while the rest of the food she sells in the city of Pampas, to where she goes down once a week, as the area where Norma lives is rural and is located between hills and ravines so it is difficult to have to go constantly to the city.  

Now she wishes to improve the quantity of milk production so she plans to buy a quality cow.  She belongs to the communal bank “San Miguel de Huallhua” and this is her sixth loan with MFP.  During this time she was able to obtain many benefits and for that she is grateful for the help of her association, where the people are responsible and supportive and for that reason she promises to be punctual in her payments.  Norma will invest the money in the purchase of a dairy cow of good quality in order to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo, de 40 años, es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de su esposa Marina y sus 5 hijos a los que cuida en la casa que compró hace 4 años. Todas las mañanas gusta mucho de salir por los campos para pastar a sus vacas, cuenta que su secreto es sembrar la alfalfa que comerán sus ganados, pues de esa manera cuida de su buena alimentación, posee 4 vacas de buena calidad, los cuales le brindan la leche que necesita para la elaboración de queso que comercializa a los clientes que tiene desde hace muchos años. La pasión por el campo lo heredó de sus padres y abuelos, quienes trabajaron en el campo, cuando conformó su familia comenzó a independizarse en las labores y administrar por el mismo el ganado y la agricultura, ya que también siembra productos agrícolas. Él pertenece al banco comunal “san miguel de huallhua” y este es el crédito número 1 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos.
Lorenzo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro pequeño con la intención de aumentar su ganado mediante la reproducción.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is 40 years old and is a hardworking man. He lives with his wife, Marina and 5 children whom he cares for in the home that he bought 4 years ago. Every morning, Lorenzo enjoys going to the fields to graze his cattle and says that his secret is to grow alfalfa that his cattle enjoy. This allows his livestock to be well fed, he has 4 cattle that are in good condition and give him milk that he uses to make cheese that he has sold to his customers for many years. The passion for the land he inherited from his parents and grandparents who worked in the fields, when he started his family he started to be autonomous in his work and managing his cattle and farmland. Lorenzo belongs to the San Miguel de Huallhua Communal bank and this is his first loan with MFP. During this time he started to have a lot of advice and is grateful for the support of the organization where the people are responsible and united which is why he is committed to being punctual in all of his payments.

Lorenzo will use the money loaned to buy a small bull to increase his cattle by breeding his livestock.

loans.use: buy a young bull.

loans.name: Santa Monica Group

texts.es: Santa Mónica es un grupo solidario muy bueno y trabajador. Francisca es una mujer casada de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y se dedica a hacer costuras, siempre se ha dedicado a las costuras y le gusta mucho lo que hace; nos menciona que la gente la busca para hacer trabajos y costuras especiales. El crédito lo utilizara para comprar una maquina de coser mejor, ya que la de ella esta muy vieja, además de que quiere comprar mas material para dar mas variedad a sus clientes. Su sueño es tener su propio taller de costura para darles a sus clientes un mejor servicio.
texts.en: “Santa Mónica” is a very good, hardworking group.  Francisca is a 48-year-old married woman.  She’s a hardworking woman who does sewing.  She’s always worked sewing and likes what she does very much.  She mentions that people seek her out to do special jobs and sewing.  She will use the loan to buy a better sewing machine since hers is quite old.  She also wants to buy more material to have more variety available for her customers.  Her dream is to have her own sewing workshop to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Shima Group

texts.fr:
Emile fait partie du groupe  Shima et  habite à  Ruyigi. Il a 43 ans et est marié à Petronie ,une cultivatrice.Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants dont 5 étudient.

Il fait le métier de tailleur   depuis  8 ans. Il vend des habits qu’il  a cousus.

Il est à son dixième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  de tissus pour coudre  beaucoup d’habits à revendre, pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Emile is part of the group Shima and lives in Ruyigi. He is 43 years old and married to Petronie, a farmer. Together they have seven children, of whom five are students. 

He has been a tailor by trade for eight years. He sells clothing, which he sews. 

He is on his tenth loan with Turame. With this KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase cloth to sewing many pieces of clothing, so as to earn more.

loans.use: to purchase a lot of cloth for sewing a lot of clothing to resell

loans.name: Las Reynas Group

texts.es:
María Azucena es integrante del grupo las Reynas, es una mujer casada de 33 años, vive en la población de Monterrey, N.L. junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 13, 10 y 3 años de edad, todos estudian. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y juguetes. Comenzó desde hace 3 años vendiendo ropa usada que conseguía con sus parientes y amistades. El crédito lo utilizara para comprar una estructura y mesas, ya que su mercancía la tiene en el piso.

Azucena nos menciona que le va muy bien y nada mas se pone a vender 4 días, de vez en cuando trae buena ropa, pero quiere buscar un punto donde pueda vender mejor y tenga mas clientela.

Las Reynas son un grupo muy bueno que ya tiene 5 ciclos con la empresa.
texts.en:
María Azucena is a member of the “Las Reynas” (The Queens) group.  She’s a married, 33-year-old woman living in the city of Monterrey, Nuevo León with her husband and three children who are 13, 10 and 3 years of age, all are attending school.  She sells used clothes and toys.  She started three years ago selling used clothes that she’d get from family members and acquaintances.  She will use the loan to buy shelving because she currently has to store her clothes on the floor.  

Azucena mentions that she does very good and only sells four days.  Occasionally she brings new clothes but she wants to find a spot where she can sell better and have more customers.  

Las Reynas is a very good group that has been with the firm for five cycles.

loans.use: to buy a sturcture  to protect the clothes she sells from the sun and table to display the clothes.

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: Rokhaya est une femme mariée, mère de quatre enfants dont les deux fréquentent l'école primaire.Elle exerce un commerce de tissus locaux et importés.Son commerce lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins et de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille.Son activité lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins mais également de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce à l'approche des fêtes, elle sollicite un prêt de 500 000f pour acheter des tissus. Son ambition est de faire des voyages de commerce.
texts.en:
Rokhaya is a married woman and the mother of four children, of whom two attend elementary school. She has a business selling local and imported fabrics. Her business brings in the revenues enabling her to meet her needs and to cover the expenses of caring for her family. 

To bolster her business capital as the holidays approach, she is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs to purchase fabrics. Her ambition is to take business trips.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase charcoal and firewood for resale.

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal DURABANK, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Santusa  tiene 40 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de brindar servicio de llamadas locales y nacionales, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio, la socia trabaja de forma independiente y ambulatoria por el centro de la ciudad, la socia a la vez trabaja en una casa cocinado de lunes a sábado siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a  su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un equipo nuevo de celular y para comprar algunos viveres de primera necesidad como leche y azucar.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Santusa is a member of the Communal Bank “Durabank” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 40 years old, separated from her spouse, and has three children. Santusa divides her time between her daily activities and her business of providing call services (both local and international). She has been in this business for a long time and has done very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Santusa works independently as a street vendor in the central part of the city. She also works from home by cooking Monday through Saturday. This enables her to move her family forward.

Santusa is requesting a loan so that she can buy new mobile phone equipment and some basic food necessities, such as milk and sugar. She is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy new mobile phone equipment and some basic food necessities, such as milk and sugar.

loans.name: Dúo Pinares De San Juan Group

texts.es:
DUO PINARES DE SAN JUAN
La líder de este grupo es doña Ana Maria de 44 años de edad quien inicio su negocio  hace un año gracias al apoyo de su compañera ya que ambas se dieron animos y apoyo mutuo para salir adelante,ellas viven en la  localidad de San Juan Sacatepéquez, y los días sábados se unen para la elaboración de tamales Guatemaltecos y tamales Mexicanos, doña Ana Maria también se dedica  entre semana a la venta de ropa para niños y grandes, teniendo así un ingreso mas para apoyar  a sus esposo y cuidar así de sus 3 hijos, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de insumos para la elaboracion de tamales y tambien para la compra de ropa nueva para la venta.
texts.en:
PINARES DE SAN JUAN DUO

The leader of this group is Ana María, 44.  She started her business a year ago thanks to support from her partner, both are very motivated and support each other to get ahead.  They both live in San Juan Sacatepéquez and they get together on Saturdays to make Guatemalan and Mexican tamales.  Ana María also sells clothes for children and adults during the week thereby earning extra income to help her husband and care for her three children.  She’s requesting this loan to buy ingredients to make the tamales and also to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tamales and to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase the latest style of clothing to sell in her store

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr: Maïmouna est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de deux enfants.Après sa formation en couture, elle a ouvert un atelier dans sa localité.Elle emploie des jeunes filles et garçons à qui elle apprend le métier.Son activité lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants notamment en période de fête.Elle arrive ainsi à subvenir à ses besoins et à prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter des une nouvelle machine à coudre.Son ambition est d'ouvrir un second atelier de couture.
texts.en: Maïmouna is a married woman. She is the mother of two children. After her training in sewing, she opened a workshop in her town. She employs girls and boys who are learning the trade from her. Her business brings in substantial enough revenues, particularly in this holiday period.
