She thus manages to meet her needs and to cover the expenses of caring for her family. To bolster her business capital, she is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs to purchase a new sewing machine. Her ambition is to open a second sewing workshop.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes ocupaciones, como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen siete  hijos pero dos de ellos fallecieron, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad, dos de ellos  aun vive con ella. Su esposo es agricultor.

Ella tiene una tienda en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, frutas y legumbres  entre otras cosas, trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, en su tienda sus clientes encuentran todo lo necesario y es por esto que cada día tiene más clientes. Su hija que vive en su casa le  ayuda en su trabajo, lleva 4 años con su negocio y le está yendo muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 2 años y le gusta porque con cada crédito mejora su negocio.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The New Dawn Communal Bank meets in the Bajo de Montecristi area in the Manabí province, which is a small place surrounded by a lot of vegetation, its inhabitants have different jobs like salespeople and factory workers.

Mrs. María lives in this place, she is 54 years old, is married and from this relationship she has seven children but two passed away. Her children are all adults and two still live with her. Her husband is a farmer.

Mrs. María has a store in her home and sells all types of products like rice, sugar, oils, detergents, fruits and vegetables and other items. She works everyday from 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and sometimes even later, in her store her customers can find everything necessary and is the reason why each day she has more customers. Her daughter lives in her home and helps her in the job, Mrs. María has worked 4 years in the business and is doing very well.

The loan will be used to stock her store; she will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic household goods. Mrs. María has been in the communal bank for 3 years and enjoys it because each loan has helped her improve her business.

Her goals are to keep her business growing and that her store will keep growing each day.

loans.use: buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic household goods.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal FUENTE DE VIDA,el banco se encuentra situado en el distrito de Cusco,provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 33 años de edad,01 hijo y es separada,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa como casacas,polos,chompas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja de forma independiente y a pedido repartiendo su mercaderia a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades y clientes,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como casacas.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito ortorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank FUENTE DE VIDA. The bank is located in the Cucso District, Province and Department of Cusco. 

She is 33 years old, has one child, and is separated. She alternates her daily activities with the business of buying and selling clothing like jackets, t-shirts, and sweaters, among other things. She has been working in this business for a good length of time and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She works independently and to order, delivering her merchandise to those who ask, like friends and customers. She is a responsible and hard-working person, and this is how she moves her family forward.

She is applying for the loan to buy merchandise like jackets. She is very grateful for the loan given and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like jackets.

loans.name: Luna Turquesa Group

texts.es:
Cristina es una mujer de 34 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos de 15, 13, 9 y 6 años. Es casada, su esposo es empleado en una fabrica. Ella es una de las integrantes del grupo Luna Turquesa e inicio su negocio vendiendo joyería y zapatos usados. Sus créditos la han ayudado a elevar su negocio, primero compro una rocola para rentarla, después junto las cosas para comenzar a vender comida mexicana y compro un tanque de gas y el resto de las cosas para que le faltaban para su negocio.

Hoy ya esta funcionando su negocio, en su puesto la ayudan sus hijos y su esposo; ella sabe que le falta mucho para tener un restaurante, pero echándole ganas sabe que puede llegar a conseguir su sueño.

El grupo Luna Turquesa ya tiene con la empresa 6 ciclos, es un grupo muy bueno y trabajador, todas sus integrantes ya se conocen muy bien y se apoyan unas a otras.
texts.en: Cristina is 34 years old and has four sons, aged 15, 13, 9, and 6. She is married, and her husband works in a factory. She is one of the members of Luna Turquesa Group. She started her business selling jewelry and used shoes. The loans she took out helped her improve her business: firstly, she bought a jukebox to rent it out, then she bought ingredients to start preparing and selling Mexican food, and lastly she bought a gas cylinder and other things she needed for her business. Her business is working well today, with the help of her husband and sons. She knows that she is a long way away from having a restaurant, but she hopes all her efforts will help her achieve this dream of hers. Luna Turquesa Group is already in its sixth cycle with the field partner. It is a very good and hardworking group; all its members know and support each other very well.

loans.use: to buy a gas cylinder.

loans.name: Siradiou

texts.fr:
Monsieur  Siradiou est un commerçant qui exerce le métier  depuis 6 ans, métier qu’il a choisi par amour. Il fait de la vente de divers produits ,denrées alimentaires. Siradiou, âgé de 32 ans, est marié et père de 3 enfants dont le plus âgé a 7 ans et le plus jeune ,2 ans. Il s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne et travaille pour l’amélioration des conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
Il démarre sa journée à 7h 30mn et fini à 00h. Toute son énergie est concentrée à la recherche de fond pour l’augmentation de son stock. Il travaille pour avoir un magasin de ventes de produits divers.
texts.en:
Mr. Siradiou has been a tradesman for six years. It is a business that he chose by love. He sells various products, foodstuffs. Siradiou, who is 32, is married and has three children of which the oldest is seven and the youngest is two. He pays the daily expenses and works to improve the dietary conditions of his family.
He starts his day at 0730 and finishes at 00h. All his energy is focused on finding funds to increase his stock. He works hard to be able to have a shop for selling various products.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to stock in his shop and resell.

loans.name: Maty

texts.fr:
Madame Maty, 38 ans, est une jeune commerçante qui a embrassé le métier par amour. Depuis le jeune âge, elle a toujours voulu s’investir pleinement dans le commerce et avoir sa propre autonomie financière. Elle vend des effets de femme et des habits prêts à porter.
Madame Maty, ne reste pas les bras croisés dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne, elle donne sa participation.
Avec le crédit, elle pourra augmenter son stock de marchandises et satisfaire toute la clientèle qui se présentera à elle.
Elle a comme ambition, d’ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter et d’effets pour femmes car elle fait de l’ambulant par manque de moyens financiers.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maty, age 38, is a young merchant who chose to work in commerce out of love for this occupation. From a young age, she wanted to devote herself to commerce and become financially independent. She sells ladies’ apparel and ready-to-wear. She plays an active role in the management of daily expenses. 

Mrs. Maty plans to use her loan to increase her stock. This will help her to fully meet customer demand. Her goal is to open a clothing store to sell ladies’ apparel and ready-to-wear, as she currently conducts her sales door-to-door due to limited funds.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing for resale.

loans.name: Haouwa Mamoudou

texts.fr:
Notre emprunteur s’appelle Haouwa Mamadou, elle est âgée de 47 ans, mariée et mère de 4 enfants qui ont entre 30 et 18 ans .Voulant épauler son mari dans les charges  familiales , mais aussi comme la plupart des gens de cette race, elle aime élever des bêtes. C’est pourquoi elle s’est lancée dans l’embouche bovine. Mais comme son fond n’était pas suffisant, elle veut emprunter de l’argent à l’IMCEC ; 400000F CFA afin d’acheter au moins 3 à 4 bœufs pour les élever et les revendre. 
Avec plusieurs opérations réussies, elle pourra réaliser son vœu le plus cher : celui d’avoir une grande ferme d’élevage.
texts.en:
Haouwa Mamadou, age 47, is a married mother of four children aged 18 to 30. In an effort to assist her husband with the household expenses, she considered cattle breeding, a popular activity amongst her peers, and opted for oxen fattening. Short on capital, she is seeking a loan of 400,000F CFA from IMCEC to buy at least 3 or 4 oxen to fatten up and resell. 

She hopes that several successful operations will help her to fulfill her dream to own a large cattle farm.

loans.use: to buy oxen to fatten up and resell.

loans.name: Gpf Diacksao Group

texts.fr:
Le GPF Diacksao regroupe 5 femmes de la même famille qui font du commerce pour améliorer leurs conditions de vie et celle de leur famille. Il est dirigé par la dame Oumou qui est âgée de 65 ans  et qui fait du commerce de tissus depuis 4 ans. Elle a 9 grands enfants dont le plus âgé a 30 ans et le cadet, 18 ans .Elle ne fait le métier que pour appuyer aux charges familiales vu son âge avancé. Elle possède une clientèle dans le quartier  et ne fait pratiquement pas de déplacement pour vendre ses produits. 
Elle souhaitera cependant varier son activité en y ajoutant la vente de produits alimentaires ; rester sur place en ouvrant une boutique non loin de chez elle.
texts.en: GPF Diaksao is a grouping of five women from the same family, who trade in order to improve their living conditions as well as those of their families. The group is managed by the lady, Oumou, who is 65 years old and who has been selling fabrics for the past four years. She has nine grown-up children, the eldest of whom is 30 years old and the youngest 18. She carries out her trade solely to contribute to the family's expenses in view of her advanced years. She has a customer base in the neighborhood and moves very little to sell her products. She would, however, like to vary her activity by selling groceries as well, doing this locally by opening a shop not far from her home.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.fr: Mr Kodjo âgé de 43ans vit avec ses 03 enfants et sa femme revendeuse à Lomé. Les 03 enfants âgés de 14, 11 et 08ans sont tous scolarisés. Il est tailleur de profession. Afin de joindre les deux bouts, il vend en même temps des matériels d’électricité et des produits de mercerie. Son activité se déroule dans une boutique et il sollicite ce second crédit pour acheter des matériels de travail et de couture.  Il veut avoir une famille heureuse,bien éduquée et agrandir son activité.
texts.en: Mr. Kodjo, aged 43, lives with his three children and wife, who is a retailer, in Lomé The three children are 14, 11, and 8 years old and are all in school. Mr. Kodjo is a tailor by trade. To make ends meet, he also sells electrical goods and sewing supplies. His business operates in a shop, and he is requesting this second loan to purchase supplies for work and for tailoring. He wants to have a happy, well-educated family and to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase electrical supplies and equipment to sell

loans.name: Fatimata

texts.fr:
Madame Fatimata est une brave femme qui s’active depuis 10 ans dans le métier de commerçante. Elle vend des habits prêts à porter et des chaussures qu’elle écoule dans le quartier et dans les environs. Elle a une clientèle régulière et diverses. Madame Fatimata est mariée et mère de 4 enfants, dont l’ainé a 33 ans et le cadet 18 ans. Elle a de grands enfants qui l’appui dans les charges de la maison mais cela ne l’empêche pas de donner sa participation dans les dépenses quotidiennes. 
Avec le crédit, elle pourra augmenter son stock de produits et satisfaire toute la clientèle qui se présentera à elle.
Elle a comme ambition, de chercher une boutique d’alimentation générale afin de diversifier ses activités et de maximiser son profit.
texts.en:
Fatimata is a courageous woman who has been actively involved in retail business for the past ten years.  She sells shoes and ready-to-wear clothing in her neighborhood and the surrounding areas, to a regular and diverse group of customers.

Fatimata is married and the mother of four children, ages 18 to 33 years old.  Her adult children help her with the household expenses but she still contributes to the day-to-day living expenses.

With her loan, she will be able to increase her inventory and to meet the needs of her customers.

Her ambition is to open a grocery store which will allow her to diversify her business and maximize her profits.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothing for resale.

loans.name: Adzo

texts.fr: Mariée à un professeur d’école, Adzo âgée de 37ans est mère de 03 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. Le premier a 16ans et le dernier 10ans. Adzo quant à elle est âgée de 37ans. Pour prêter main forte à son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle vend des articles scolaires et des cartes de recharge à domicile et en même temps dans une boutique à ses clients. Pour éviter la concurrence dont elle est confrontée sur le terrain, elle sollicite un premier prêt dans notre institution pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut voir ses enfants grandir dans de bonnes conditions et rendre pérenne son activité.
texts.en:
Married to a school teacher, Adzo is a 37-year-old mother of three children, who are in school. The first child is 16 years old, and the last is 10. Adzo herself is 37 years old. To help out her husband in covering household expenses, she sells school supplies and mobile phone minutes out of her home and also in a store for her customers. 

To avoid the competition to which she is confronted on the ground, she is requesting an initial loan from our institution to stock up on merchandise, so as to respond better to the needs of her customers. She wants to see her children grow up under the right conditions and to sustain her business.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies and phone minute card

loans.name: Diandia

texts.fr: Diandia, une femme de 31 ans, fait du commerce depuis maintenant 6 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d’un enfant de 6 ans. Son activité consiste à vendre des habits prêts à porter et des tissus de tout genre. Cela fait maintenant 4 ans qu’elle est dans le métier. Elle démarre sa journée de 8 h du matin à 13h. Elle participe à la dépense quotidienne de la famille. Elle sollicite un crédit pour augmenter  son stock de marchandises et améliorer  les conditions alimentaires des membres de sa famille. IL a comme vœux d’ouvrir une boutique de vente de prêt à porter.
texts.en:
Diandia is 31 years old, married, and mother of one six-year-old child. She has been working in commerce for six years now.

Her business consists of selling ready-to-wear clothing of all sorts of fabric. She has been in this line of work for four years now. She starts her day at 8 a.m. and works to 1 p.m. She helps cover her family's daily expenses.

She is seeking a loan in order to increase her inventory of goods and improve the nutrition of the foods that her family eats. She also wants to open a ready-to-wear clothing store.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothes to resell

loans.name: Gpf Halwar Group

texts.fr:
Le GPF Halwar regroupe 5 femmes qui font du commerce. Elles viennent solliciter pour la 1ère fois un crédit de 500000F CFA afin d’améliorer leur activité. La présidente, madame Aissata fait de l’aviculture à petite échelle avec seulement 50 sujets. Activité qu’elle a récemment démarrée depuis seulement  1 an. Grace aux revenus de son activité, elle réussi à gérer  certaines dépenses du foyer. 
Avec le crédit sollicité, elle pourra diversifier les produits et services en achetant du poisson sec, de la patte d’arachide…
Elle ira même plus loin puisque voulant ouvrir un magasin de vente de prêt à porter et produits cosmétiques si elle a l’appui de structures financières comme l’IMCEC.
texts.en:
GPF HALWAR is a group which consists of five women who are involved in retail business.  For their first loan, their are requesting 500,000 CFA francs, in order to boost their activity.

The leader of the group, Aissata, raises poultry on a small scale (she only owns 50 birds).  She just started this activity a year ago.  Thanks to the earnings generated through this business, she has been able to cover some of the expenses of her household.

This loan will help her to diversify her products and services since she will also buy dried fish and groundnut paste.

If she can obtain the support of financial institutions such as the UIMCEC, Aissata plans to expand her activity even further, as she would like to open a shop in which she will sell ready-to-wear clothing and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy dried fish, groundnut paste and broiler chicken for resale.

loans.name: Aida

texts.fr:
La dame Aida vient d’entamer  récemment une activité  de commerce pour tenter une nouvelle expérience. Le crédit qu’elle sollicite lui servira à l’achat et à la vente de tissus : Khartoum, maylous. Aida, âgée de 45 ans est divorcée et mère de 4 enfants dont le plus âgée a 22 ans et le cadet, 20 ans ; elle s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne et de sa location. Avec le crédit, elle pourra épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. 
Comme elle  est à ses débuts, elle aimerait avoir un peu plus de fond pour élargir son activité de commerce et pouvoir vendre d’autres produits et diversifier.
texts.en:
Aida, age 45, is a divorced mother of 4 children, the two eldest aged 22 and 20. She handles the household’s daily needs and rental expenses. 

Aida recently decided to try something new and started buying and selling fabrics. She is seeking a loan to buy Khartoum and maylous. 

This credit will help her to save and to improve her family’s food situation. 

Since she is just starting out, she would like to have more capital at her disposal to expand her activity and diversify her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Gpf Modiéré Ndouloumodji Group

texts.fr:
Le GPF Modiére Ndouloumodji  rassemble des membres d’une même famille. Elle fond toute du commerce et sont au nombre de quatre. La présidente, Houraye, fait de la vente de tissus depuis 10ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants âgés entre 23 et 3 ans. Après s’être occupée   de ses enfants le matin elle démarre ses activités commerciales vers 10h, jusqu’à 13h.
Houraye participe à la dépense quotidienne de la maison. Elle a un grand souhait présentement : celui d’ouvrir un magasin de vente de tissus pour être beaucoup plus connu afin de pouvoir écouler ses produits.
texts.en:
GPF Modiére Ndouloumodji is a group which consists of members of a single family.  There are four women in the group, all involved in retail business.

The group's leader, Houraye, has been selling fabrics for ten years.  She is married and the mother of five children, ages 3 to 23 years old.  After taking care of her children in the morning, she works from 10AM until 1PM. 

Houraye contributes to the day-to-day living expenses of the household.  Her dream is to open a store where she could sell her fabrics.  This would help her to be better known, and to sell more.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Coumba Demba

texts.fr:
Madame Coumba Demba est une dame de 43 ans qui s’active dans le commerce spécialement dans la vente de tissus. Elle a acquis une expérience de plus de 10 ans. Elle a toujours aimé ce métier et possède une clientèle régulière dans le quartier. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont le plus âgé  a 20 ans et le cadet, 6 ans. Coumba Demba s’est mariée très tôt c’est pourquoi elle possède une famille nombreuse. Pour pouvoir satisfaire leurs besoins et veiller à ce qu’ils ne manquent de rien, elle se voue corps et âme à son métier. C’est grâce à son activité, qu’elle réussi à gérer ses charges personnelles.
Avec le crédit elle veut augmenter son stock de marchandises et ouvrir un grand magasin de ventes de tissus.
texts.en:
Mrs. Coumba Demba, age 43, is a married mother of seven children aged 6 to 20. She married at a young age, which explains her large family. To provide for her family and make sure that they have everything they need, she devotes herself to her occupation heart, body and soul. 

She sells fabrics, and has over 10 years of experience in this activity. She has always enjoyed this work, and has built a steady customer base in the area. This activity allows her to cover her own personal expenses. 

She plans to use this loan to increase her stock of fabrics and open a large store.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Lolina

texts.en: Lolina is 62 years old, married, with 4 adult-age children. She has been an active member of PMPC since 2011. She lives in Pisong B, Maria, Siquijor.  She engages in making and selling snacks. She has operated such an activity for her livelihood for almost 30 years, with a monthly income of Php 2,400.  She took a loan with PMPC intending to purchase raw ingredients to make snacks for sale. She plans to use the profit to improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to make snacks for sale

loans.name: Virginie

texts.fr: Propriétaire d’une boutique d’alimentation générale, Virginie est sans enfant âgée de 34 ans. Elle a débuté cette activité depuis 2010 et se fait aidée par une personne. Elle sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour l’achat des produits d’alimentation générale en vue de renforcer son commerce et devenir grossiste. Elle compte utiliser le profit supplémentaire pour l’entretien de sa famille.
texts.en: Virginie is the owner of a grocery store and she is 34 years old with no children. She began this business in 2012 and is helped by one person. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES so that she can buy groceries with a view to strengthening her business and becoming a wholesaler. She is planning to use the extra profits she makes to look after her family.

loans.use: to buy general groceries.

loans.name: Tadjondjine

texts.fr: Spécialisé dans la revente de matériel électrique et divers, Tadjondine a débuté cette activité en 2009. Âgé de 26 ans, il est marié à une jeune infirmière et n’ont pas encore de progéniture. Il dispose d’une boutique où il assure la distribution de ses produits. Il  sollicite son second prêt auprès de notre institution pour acheter de la marchandise et augmenter son stock. Il souhaite ouvrir une autre boutique et réaliser suffisamment de bénéfice pour assurer l’avenir de ses futurs enfants.
texts.en:
Specializing in the resale of electrical equipment and other goods, Tadjondine started his business in 2009. 26 years old, he is married to a young nurse. The couple does not yet have any children. 

Tadjondine has a shop where he sells his goods. He is asking for a second loan through our institution [WAGES] to buy merchandise to increase his stock. 

He would like to open another shop and earn enough to take care of his future children.

loans.use: to buy electrical equipment and other goods

loans.name: Elisabete Diouf Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit rassemble 5 femmes de la même famille qui font du commerce. Elles ont donné à leur groupement, le nom d’une ancienne première dame du pays : Elisabeth Diouf. Elles sont à leur 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC et veulent un renouvellement pour  augmenter leur production et améliorer leur activité quotidienne.
Leur présidente, la dame Aissata, mariée et mère de famille, fait du commerce depuis 3 ans maintenant. Elle achète pour revendre du « thiakry ». Le « thiakry est un plat confectionné à partir de mil transformé.
Madame Aissata aide à la dépense quotidienne de la famille. Avec le crédit, elle pourra augmenter son stock de marchandises.
Comme projet futur, la dame Aissata veut exploiter son champ et y faire du maraichage.
texts.en:
This loan group is made up of five women from the same family, who all trade. They have christened their group Elisabeth Diouf, the name of a former prime minister of the country. They are on their third loan from IMCEC and want a renewal of the loan to increase their production and improve their daily businesses. 

Their, president, Aissata, who is married and a mother, has been trading for the past three years. She buys products to resell "thiakry" (a dish made up of millet couscous and yoghurt). Assiata helps out with the household expenses and with this loan she can increase her stock. As a future project she would like to farm her own field and do market gardening.

loans.use: to buy millet and make it up into "thiakry" for resale.

loans.name: Alpha

texts.fr: Monsieur Alpha est un homme marié qui vit au Sénégal. Il  s’active depuis un an dans une société de gardiennage. Il est membre d’un guichet de l’UIMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour une opération tabaski. Il vit loin de sa femme et lui envoie périodiquement de l’argent pour sa nourriture. Son crédit lui permettra d’accroitre ses revenus et  par conséquent  d’améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa petite famille.Son  PROJET FUTUR est de devenir un grand éleveur.
texts.en: Alpha is a married man who lives in Senegal. He has been working for a security firm for the past year. He is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches and is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs for a transaction relating to Tabaski (also known as the Sheep Festival). He lives far from his wife and regularly sends her money for her food. His loan will enable him to increase his income and thus improve his small family's nutrition. His future project is to become an important livestock farmer.

loans.use: to buy some sheep for resale for the Tabaski festival.

loans.name: Kelle Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois Kelle est créé le 30 décembre 2009. Le groupe est constitué de  30 femmes qui habitent ensemble et sont en bonne entente.

La présidente, Diakhaté est une femme de 27 ans, mariée avec 05 enfants dont 03 filles et 02 garçons.Elle vend des poissons dans le village. Elle fait aussi de l'embouche ovine. Elle mène ces activités depuis plus de 03 ans. Sur la photo elle est tout à fait à droite, prés de la femme en écharpe rose, la main droite levée et porte un enfant sur le coté.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrai acheter 02 moutons pour embouche et des habits d'enfants pour son petit commerce avec les fêtes qui arrivent.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle paie la scolarité de son enfant qui va à la case des touts petit du village et a en charge ses propres besoins.
texts.en:
The village lending group Kelle was created on December 30, 2009. The group is made up of 30 women who live together and have a good understanding of one another.

The president, Diakhaté, is a 27 year old woman, married with 5 children, 3 girls and 2 boys. She sells fish in the village. She also practices beef fattening. She has been working in these businesses for more than three years. In the photo, she is at the far right, near the woman with the pink scarf, with her hand raised and holding a child at her side.

With this loan, she would like to buy two sheep to fatten and children's clothing for her small business, because of the holidays coming up.

With her profits, she will pay the school fees of her child who goes to the village nursery school (Case des Touts-Petits or CTP) and take care of her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy sheep and children's clothing for her business.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Me llamo Porfirio,tengo 46 años de edad, soy padre de 6 hijos todos menores de edad, trabajo comprando y creando ganado para engorde y para producción de leche, esta actividad gracias a Dios es la que permite el sustento de la familia,  y el pago de otras obligaciones del hogar. Estoy solicitando un préstamo por un millón de colones (¢1.000.000) para comprar ganado de engorde y ganado lechero para eleborar productos lácteos.
Estoy muy feliz de tener esta oportunidad de obtener crédito rápido y con cuotas que realmente puedo pagar.
texts.en:
My name is Porfirio, I'm 46 years old. I am the father of 6 children, all young. I work purchasing and raising cattle to fatten and for the production of milk. Thanks to God, this work is what allows the sustenance of my family and the payment of other household expenses. 

I am requesting a loan for one million colones (¢1.000.000) which I will use to purchase cattle for making milk and to fatten, as previously indicated. 

I am very happy to have this opportunity to obtain a loan quickly and with installments that I can actually pay.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Kafui

texts.fr: Kafui âgée de 30ans est revendeuse d’articles de mercerie dans une boutique de la place depuis 2011. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur de taxi, ils n'ont pas d'enfants. Elle sollicite son premier crédit à WAGES pour l’achat des articles de mercerie. Elle souhaite renforcer son commerce et assurer l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en: Kafui is 30 years old and has been selling haberdashery products in a local shop since 2011. She is married to a taxi driver and they do not have any children. She is requesting her first loan from WAGES to buy haberdashery products. She would like to strengthen her business and ensure prosperity for her family.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery products.

loans.name: Sope Nabi Group

texts.fr:
Habitant le même quartier, ses femmes se sont regroupées en groupe de crédit pour venir solliciter un appui au niveau de l’IMCEC et pouvoir augmenter leur fond de roulement : c’est le groupe de crédit SOPE NABY.
Leur présidente, la dame Fatou, elle, achète pour revendre des habits prêts à porter et tissus. Elle fait de l’ambulant et compte sa clientèle parmi les habitants du quartier et son voisinage. Elle est mariée et participe aux charges familiales. Elle est âgée de 32 ans et a 5 enfants dont l’ainé a 16 ans et le cadet ,5. Fatou adore son métier et a une expérience de 10ans dans ce domaine. Elle a toujours rêvée de devenir une grande commerçante qui voyagerait à travers le monde entier. En attendant cela, elle aimerait beaucoup ouvrir une cantine ou elle ira exposer ses produits.
texts.en:
These women, who live in the same neighborhood, set up this loan group so that they could request funding from IMCEC and increase their working capital; the loan group is called Sope Naby.

Their president, Fatou, buys ready-to-wear clothes and fabrics for resale. She sells on a door-to-door basis and her customers include the residents of the neighborhood and surrounding areas. She is married and contributes to the household expenses. She is 32 years old and has five children, the eldest of whom is 16 years old and the youngest five. Fatou adores her job and has ten years experience in this field. She has always dreamed of becoming a significant trader who could travel all over the world. While waiting to do this she would very much like to set up a shack to display her products.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, rocks, etc.) in order to continue building a beauty parlor in her house.

loans.name: Wardja

texts.fr: Wardja chauffeur de taxi âgé de 35 ans a démarré cette activité depuis 2007. Il est marié à une revendeuse et père de 04 enfants dont 03 scolarisés.Il ambitionne de devenir propriétaire de plusieurs véhicules et investir dans l’éducation de ses enfants. Pour cela il sollicite son troisième prêt auprès de notre Institution comme complément pour l’achat d’un  véhicule qui servira de taxi.
texts.en: Wardja is a taxi driver who is 35 years old and who began this activity in 2007. He is married to retailer and has four children, three of whom are at school. His ambition is to become the owner of several cars and invest in his children's education. In order to do this he is requesting his third loan from our institution as a complement to buy a car which will be used as a taxi.

loans.use: to buy a car.

loans.name: Serigne Saliou

texts.fr: Monsieur Serigne Saliou est un homme marié qui habite au Sénégal. Il s’active depuis plus de 20 ans dans le secteur de la maçonnerie. Monsieur  Serigne commence sa journée de travail a 8 heures du matin pour la terminer a 18 heures dans l’après midi.  Les revenus qu’il gagne lui permettent de prendre en charge la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et en meme temps la scolarité de son enfant. Il est membre  d’un  guichet de l’UIMCEC  et sollicite un crédit de 400 000 prévus pour l’achat de bois de coffrage qu’il compte mettre en location. Son intention est d’accroitre  le niveau de ses revenus  dans le but de diversifier les services qu’il offre, d’élargir le nombre  de ses employés a 7, de mieux supporter les frais scolaires de son enfant, et aussi d’améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Son projet futur est de renforcer son épargne et créer son propre entreprise.
texts.en: Monsieur Serigne Saliou is a married man who lives in Senegal. He has worked for more than 20 years in the sector of masonry. Monsieur Serigne begins his work day at 8am and finishes at 6pm. The revenue that he earns allows him to take care of his family's everyday expenses and simultaneously pay for his child's school fees. He is a member of an UIMCEC branch and is asking for a loan of 400,000 XOF, to be used to buy forms for masonry that he will rent out. His intention is to increase his revenue with the goal of diversifying the services that he offers, increasing the number of employees he has to seven, better supporting his child's school feeds, and also improving the conditions of his family's diet. His future plan is to strengthen his savings and to create his own business.

loans.use: to buy masonry forms to rent out.

loans.name: El Hadji Alioune

texts.fr:
Monsieur El Hadji Alioune est un agent commercial depuis 15 ans maintenant. Il est marié et n’a pas encore d’enfants. Il fait parti des premiers clients de ce guichet  et vient solliciter pour la cinquième fois un crédit de 300000F CFA  pour appuyer sa famille qui est dans le besoin social. Il est en quelque sorte le soutien de famille à qui ont fait recours pour n’importe quel problème. Bien que ses revenus ne soit pas aussi consistant, il fait ce qu’il peut pour aider.
Il a aussi un autre projet qui lui tient à cœur : celui de construire sa maison un jour et d’y abriter toute sa famille.
texts.en: El Hadji Alioune has been a salesperson for the past 15 years. He is married but does not yet have any children. He was one of the first customers of this branch and has just requested a fifth loan of 300,000FCFA to help out his family which has social needs. In some ways he is the breadwinner for his family and they resort to him to sort out all their problems. Although his income is not that consistent, he does what he can to help them. He also has other plans which are close to his heart, notably to build his own house one day so that he can put up all his family.

loans.use: to help his family which has social needs.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 12 filhos, 6 dos quais ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe que vive com ele. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, sabão, amendoim, farinha e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro pretende construir um estabelecimento comercial maior, ampliar e mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar cada vez mais e pagar o empréstimo mais rápido possível para poder solicitar mais.
texts.en: Ismael is married and is the father of 12 children, 6 of whom go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his mother who lives with him.  He has his own business selling various products.  He will use this loan to buy products (rice, soap, peanuts, flour, etc.) to increase the quantity of his merchandise.  In the future, he hopes to build a better commercial establishment, to expand, and to furnish his house.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  HIs challenge is working more and more and to pay back the loan as quickly as possible so he can request more.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (rice, soap, peanuts, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, 3 dos quais já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus netos que vivem com ele. 	
É pedreiro de profissão e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, areia, pedra, ferro e outros) para aumentar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir e mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir juntar o fundo aos poucos para poder realizar seus projectos.
texts.en: Armando is married and is the father of five children, three of whom are already adults.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his grandchildren, who live with him.  He is a mason by profession.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, bricks, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to expand his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish and to furnish his home.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is gathering funds little by little to carry out his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, bricks, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to expand his home.

loans.name: Felismina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, 4 dos quais frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dono do seu negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (frangos, arroz, cerveja, refrescos, caldos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro pretende ampliar o seu negócio e apostar na formação dos seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é juntar fundos para responder aos estudos dos filhos e desenvolvimento do deu negocio.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, four of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a retailer who owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (chickens, rice, beer, refreshments, broths, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business and invest in her children's education. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is gathering funds to pay for her children's education and for the development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (chickens, rice, beer, refreshments, broths, etc.).

loans.name: Salvador

texts.pt:
Solteiro e sem filhos, vive na casa dos pais e sustenta seus irmãos em produtos alimentares que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha numa empresa de distribuição de água FIPAG em Boane. Com o presente empréstimo pretende pagar a legalização do seu terreno. 
No futuro deseja construir casa própria e iniciar uma actividade comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento e aumento do seu nível académico.
texts.en: Salvador is single an doesn't have children.  He lives in his parents' home and supports his siblings by buying food for the ones that live with him.  He works at a water distributing country in Boane called FIPAG.  With his current loan, he will buy the title to his land.  In the future, he hopes to build his own home and to start a business.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenges are the lack of investment funds and increasing his level of education.

loans.use: to pay for the title to his land.

loans.name: Alice

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 7 filhos, alguns ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (farinha, leite, arroz, cerveja, refrescos, vinho, caldos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro pretende adquirir mais mercadoria e reforçar cada vez mais seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar em outras actividades de geração de renda.
texts.en:
She's married and has seven children, some of whom still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a retailer who owns her own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (flour, milk, rice, beer, refreshments, wine, broths, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to buy more merchandise and bolster her business even more. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is betting on other income-generating activities.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (flour, milk, rice, beer, refreshments, wine, broths, etc.).

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 7 filhos todos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e vende produtos de primeira necessidade. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, massas, farinha, leite, arroz, amendoim, caldos e outros) para reforcar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro pretende construir mais uma casa para albergar outros membros da família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar no seu negocio para poder conseguir Maior rendimento.
texts.en:
She's a widow and has seven children, all of whom are already adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a retailer who sells basic household products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (cooking oil, noodles, flour, milk, rice, peanuts, broths, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to build another house to shelter other members of her family. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is investing in her business so that she can increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (cooking oil, noodles, flour, milk, rice, peanuts, broths, etc.).

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, 1 já maior de idade, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como técnico Administrativo numa instituição do Estado. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material eléctrico para fazer a instalação eléctrica a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende construir outra residência e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar a sua faculdade.
texts.en: Carlos is married and is the father of five children, one of whom is an adult.  He lives in his own home and doesn't support anyone besides his family.  He works as an administrative worker for a state institution.  He will use this loan to buy electric materials to install electricity in his house.  In the future, he wants to build another home and to buy his marriage license.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is to finish college.

loans.use: to buy electric materials to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe que vive com ele. 	
É trabalhador duma empresa privada e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (pedra, cimento, areia, blocos e outros) para ampliar a sua residência e oferecer melhor comodidade a sua família. 
No futuro pretende continuar com a ampliação da sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar cada vez mais no seu trabalho para poder progredir na sua careira profissional.
texts.en:
He's married and has a son who attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his mother who lives with him.
He works for a private company. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (rocks, cement, sand, bricks, etc.) in order to enlarge his house and provide more comfort for his family.
In the future he intends to continue enlarging his house. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is increasingly investing in his work, so that he can make progress in his career.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (rocks, cement, sand, bricks, etc.) in order to enlarge his house and provide more comfort for his family.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos 2 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É operária numa empresa de produção e venda de banana. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (tintas, e material eléctrico e outros) para fazer acabamentos da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja construir um aviário para a criação de frangos de corte, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar mais rápido o empréstimo para muito recentemente pedir outro.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, two of whom still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a laborer for a company that produces and sells bananas. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (paint, electrical supplies, etc.) for finishing her house.
In the future she wishes to build an aviary in order to raise broiler chickens. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is repaying the loan faster so that she can apply for another one very soon.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (paint, electrical supplies, etc.) for finishing her house.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
Casado e ainda não tem filhos, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, pedra, cimento, areia, blocos e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende aumentar o seu nível académico, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar cada vez mais no seu trabalho e no negócio de forma a aumentar as suas receitas.
texts.en:
Married and without children yet, he lives in his own home with his family and does not support anyone else.
He teaches at the Ministry for Education. With this loan, he plans to buy building materials (beams, stone, cement, sand, blocks and others) to extend his home.
In the future, he wants to improve his level of education, for which he promises to repay the loan in order to request further loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is to focus increasingly on his work and business in order to increase their revenues.

loans.use: to buy building materials (beams, stone, cement, sand, blocks and others) to extend his home.

loans.name: Adozinda

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos, 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa cedida pelos serviços com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É docente e quadro do Ministério da educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra, janelas, portas e outros) para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar o ensino superior e concluir a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para investir nos seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's single and has three children, two of whom attend school. She lives with her family in company housing and doesn't support anyone else.
She's a teacher and a staffer of the Ministry of Education. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (sand, cement, rocks, window frames, doors, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to complete her higher education and finish her house. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is not having enough funds to invest in her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (sand, cement, rocks, window frames, doors, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 6 filhos os mais novos ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É pensionista há mais de 5 anos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas, portas, ferro, cimento, areia, blocos e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende concluir a ampliação e mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar cada vez mais no seu trabalho e no negócio de forma a aumentar as suas receitas.
texts.en:
Delfina is married and the mother of 6 children, the youngest are still attending school. She lives in her own home with her family and does not support anyone else.
She has been a pensioner for over 5 years. With this loan, she plans to buy construction material (plates, doors, iron, cement, sand, blocks and others) to expand her home.
Her future plans are to complete the home expansion and also furnish her home. She is committed to the repayment of the loan in order to request further loans from Hluvuku.
Her goal is to focus increasingly on her work and business, in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy construction material (plates, doors, iron, cement, sand, blocks and others) to expand her home.

loans.name: Zaratu

texts.fr: Jeune dame de 28ans, Zaratu est mère de 02 enfants et mariée à un revendeur. Son ainé de 06ans est scolarisé et le dernier de 03ans ne va pas encore à l’école. Elle est revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2009 et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Elle est aidée par 01 personne. Avec ce premier prêt qu’elle sollicite, Zaratu va s’acheter des produits de premières nécessités, tirer un profit et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
A young woman of 28 years old, Zaratu is a mother of two children and is married to a retailer. Her eldest child is 6 years old and goes to school. The younger child is 3 years old and does not yet go to school. 

Zaratu has been a retailer of general food products since 2009. She procures her supplies in Lomé. She is helped by one other person. 

With this first loan, Zaratu is going to buy staple goods, earn a profit and meet the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy general food products

loans.name: Marte

texts.en:
Marte is 29 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and his elderly parents in a rural district in the northern part of Albania.  They have been active with livestock for the past eight years and have 3 pigs, 13 sheep, and 2 milk cows.  The earnings from this activity have been good and the parents have a decent pension resulting from high-paying jobs prior to their retirement.
Marte and her husband are also educated, but have not been able to find any jobs in their field or similar one.  As a result, their only focus is on the same livestock activity.

Marte has been scheduled for a surgery soon and needs money immediately in order to pay the hospital expenses.  Her promise to lenders is that she will pay the loan back on the scheduled days because she is responsible.

loans.use: to have surgery

loans.name: Philippe

texts.fr: Couturier de profession, Philippe est âgé de 33ans est père de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Le premier a 11ans et le dernier 06ans. Sa femme est coiffeuse. Après sa formation, il a ouvert un atelier en 2004 dans lequel il coud les habits. En plus de la couture, il vend des produits de mercerie. C’est dans le but d’augmenter son stock de mercerie qu’il sollicite ce second crédit à WAGES. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il voudrait assurer les besoins primaires de la famille et agrandir l’activité.
texts.en: A clothing maker by profession, Philippe is 33 years old and the father of three children, two of whom are in school. The oldest is 11 and the youngest is 6. His wife is a hairdresser. After completing his training, he opened a workshop in 2004 where he sews clothing. In addition to sewing, he sells sewing supplies. With the goal of increasing his stock of sewing supplies, he is asking for a second loan from WAGES. In the future, he would like to provide for the basic needs of his family and grow his business.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Âgée de 33ans, Madame abra est mariée à un soudeur. Ils ont 03 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs de l’école. Le premier a 10ans et le dernier 04ans. Elle est revendeuse de céréales dans un marché de la ville et s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les marchés de l’intérieur. C’est depuis 1997 qu’elle a démarré l’activité et elle se plait bien car cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant d’aider son mari dans les charges du foyer. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite un second crédit à WAGES. Avec les profits, elle prévoit agrandir l’activité, avoir d’autres points de vente et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Aged 33 years old, Abra is married to a welder. They have 3 children, two of whom go to school. The oldest child is 10 years old and the youngest is 4 years old.

Abra sells cereals in a village market. She procures her supplies in Lomé and in the markets of the interior. She has been in this business since 1997. She is pleased because she earns income that allows her to help her husband with the household expenses. 

To better respond to the needs of her clients, Abra is asking for a second loan through WAGES. She plans to use profits to expand her business, have other sales outlets, and to ensure the livelihood of her family.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Saiberia Group

texts.en:
Nuru is in her early 30s.  She is living with a man and has two boys, one in school and the other a baby.  She has been running a food shop for four years now.  She works from 8am to 9pm daily and is able to make a fair profit.

This will be her 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to restock existing and missing items in the food shop, and to cover school fees and household expenses.  She has paid back all of her loans successfully.  She hopes for a loan to restock more food items, to pay school fees and to finish building her family house.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a big beauty salon.

She will share this loan with her loan group, Saiberia, which totals 11 members.  They will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the missing items in her shop

loans.name: Komlavi

texts.fr: Marié à une revendeuse et père d’01 enfant d'01 an. Komlanvi âgé de 24ans est revendeur.  Il vend depuis 2009 des télévisions et autres appareils électroniques dans une boutique de la place. Il est aidé par 01 personne et sollicite un premier prêt chez nous(WAGES) pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Il voudrait diversifier sa marchandise tout en assurant les besoins primaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Komlavi is married to a retailer and a father of a one-year-old child. He is 24 years old and is a retailer.

He has been selling televisions and other electronics in local shop since 2009. He is helped by one person.

Komlavi is asking for this first loan with us (WAGES) to procure goods in order to respond to the needs of his customers. 

He would like to diversify his merchandise, while providing for the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy televisions and electronics

loans.name: Anani

texts.fr: Père de 05 enfants tous scolarisés, mr Anani est marié à une revendeuse et il est âgé de 52ans. Il est mécanicien de profession et répare les gros engins dans son atelier depuis 1988. Pour éviter la concurrence dont il est confronté par moment,  il demande l’aide de WAGES pour acheter de la caisse à outil pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Avec le profit qu’il réalisera, il veut assurer une bonne éducation à sa famille et agrandir son activité.
texts.en:
Anani is 52 years old and father of five children, all of whom have received schooling. He is married to a retailer.

He is a mechanic by trade and has been repairing large vehicles in his workshop since 1968. In order to avoid the competition that he is sometimes confronted with, he is seeking a loan from WAGES to buy a toolbox so that he can better satisfy his clients' needs.

With the profits, he wants to expand his business and ensure a good education for his family.

loans.use: to buy a toolbox

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr: Soudeur ferrailleur de profession, mr Yaovi est marié à une revendeuse. Ils ont 01 enfant de 08 mois. A la fin de son apprentissage, il a ouvert un atelier dans un quartier de la place ou il exerce son activité. Il est par moment confronté à la concurrence et pour pallier ce problème, il sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour acheter des matériels de soudure. Avec les profits réalisés, il voudrait réinvestir dans l’activité tout en prenant soin de sa famille. Notons qu’il est dans ce domaine il y a 05ans.
texts.en: An iron welder by profession, Mr. Yaovi is married to a retailer. They have one child who is 8 months old. At the end of his apprenticeship, he opened a workshop in an area of the place where he practices his business. At times, he is confronted with competition, and, to compensate for this problem, he is asking WAGES for a second loan to buy welding materials. With the profits he makes, he would like to reinvest in his business, while also taking care of his family. Let's note that he has worked in this business for five years.

loans.use: to buy welding materials.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo est âgée de 37ans. Elle est mère de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Ils sont âgés de 10 à 05ans. Elle est infirmière de profession et exerce l’activité à domicile depuis 1999. Afin de bien répondre aux besoins des patients, elle vend en même temps des produits pharmaceutiques et c’est pour l’achat de ses produits qu’elle sollicite un cinquième crédit à WAGES. Elle veut avoir une famille épanouie et agrandir son activité.
texts.en: Adjo is 37 years old. She has three children of which two attend school. They are between ten and five years old. She is a nurse by profession and has been working at home since 1999. In order to cover her patients' needs, she sells pharmaceutical products at the same time. It is for the purchase of these products that she requests a fifth loan from WAGES. She wants to have a happy, well adjusted family and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Ablamvi Théophile

texts.fr: Conducteur de taxi-moto, Ablamvi Théophile est marié à une revendeuse et ils ont 04 enfants tous des écoliers. L’ainé a 15ans et le dernier 07ans. Il sollicite un troisième crédit à WAGES pour s’acheter une nouvelle moto. Il voudrait à l’avenir, assurer les besoins primaires de la famille et ajouter d’autres activités complémentaires. Notons qu’il est âgé de 38ans et a une ancienneté de 06ans dans l’activité.
texts.en:
Ablamvi Théophile is a motorbike taxi driver. 

He is married to a retailer and they have four children, all in school. The eldest is 15 years old and the youngest is 7 years old. 

Ablamvi Théophile is asking for a third loan from WAGES to buy himself a new motorbike. 

He would like, in the future, to ensure the needs of his family are met and take up some other types of work. 

Note that Ablamvi Théophile is 38 years old and has 6 years experience as a motorbike taxi-driver.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Topi Group

texts.en:
Shebu, who is in her early 40s, is married with two children who are still going to school.  She has been making a living by selling new clothes door-to-door. She works from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This is going to be her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more clothes to resell and has paid back her loan successfully.  She wants a loan to buy more clothes to resell and to pay school fees for her children.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a food cafe.

Shebu will share this loan with her loan group, Topi, which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to resell and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Komlanvi

texts.fr: Agé de 25ans, célibataire et sans enfant, Komlanvi est revendeur de chaussures. Il mène cette activité depuis 2009 et il l’expose sur étalage devant le domicile. Komlanvi est confronté à la concurrence et pour remédier à cela, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un premier prêt pour acheter plus de chaussures afin de garder ses clients. Avec les profits qu’il récoltera de sa vente, il veut fonder un foyer tout en gardant la pérennité de son activité.
texts.en: Aged 25, unmarried and childless, Komlanvi sells shoes. He has been in this business since 2009 and he displays his merchandise on a stand in front of his house. Komlanvi is confronted with competition and to find a solution to this, he requests the help of WAGES for a first loan to buy more shoes, so that he can keep his clients. With the profits that he will make from his sales, he wants to set up home at the same time as maintaining the durability of his business.

loans.use: To buy shoes.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr:
Monsieur Abdoulaye est un transporteur  depuis 15 ans maintenant. Il possède un véhicule Mercédès avec lequel il travaille pour subvenir à ses besoins. Abdoulaye est mariée et père de famille, d’ailleurs c’est lui qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne du foyer.
Il commence sa journée à 8h et la termine à 17h du soir .Il vient solliciter un crédit de 200000F CFA pour la 1ère fois, afin de changer les quatre pneus de son véhicule. Avec le crédit, il pourra épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires  de son foyer.
En dehors de cette activité, Abdoulaye possède des terres qu’il veut exploiter  et y faire des cultures maraichères.
texts.en:
Abdoulaye has been a transporter for the past 15 years. He has a Mercedes vehicle which he works with in order to provide for his needs. He is married and a father, and it is he who takes care of the daily household expenses. He begins his day at 8 o'clock in the morning and finishes at 5 o'clock in the evening. He has just requested a 200,000FCFA loan for the first time so that he can change his vehicle's four tyres. With the loan, he will be able to save money and improve his family's nutrition. 

Aside from this activity, Abdoulay owns some land that he would like to farm and where he could grow market gardening produce.

loans.use: to buy tyres for his Mercedes vehicle which he uses for transport

loans.name: Doh

texts.fr: Mr Doh est âgé de 41ans. Il à pour femme une cuisinière et est père de famille. Pour assurer les besoins de la famille, il a commencé par vendre depuis 2010 des produits congelés dans une boutique. La demande devient de plus en plus grande et n’arrivant plus à répondre aux besoins des clients, il sollicite auprès de WAGES un premier  prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il souhaite multiplier ses points de vente et rendre plus heureuse sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Doh is 41 years old. His wife is a cook, and he is a father with a family. To ensure that family needs are met, he started a business in 2010 selling frozen foods in a shop. The demand is growing stronger and stronger, thus he no longer can meet the demands of his customers. He is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to stock up on goods. For the future, he would like to increase the number of his sales outlets and to make his family happy.

loans.use: to purchase frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Ousmane, un jeune cultivateur, possède un champ qu’il veut mettre en valeur. Il décide de demander de l’appui à l’IMCEC pour un crédit de 75000F CFA. Ousmane va acheter des semences de poivron et de tomate ; et veut aussi réfectionner son puits pour que l’exploitation soit plus facile. Il est expérimenté dans le domaine car il a fait maintenant plus de  10 ans d’activité.
Ousmane est marié et père de famille. N’étant pas le seul homme dans la maison, il ne fait que participer  à la dépense quotidienne. Si ses revenus augmentent, il envisage d’acquérir une machine moto pompe pour améliorer son exploitation.
texts.en:
Ousmane, a young farmer, owns a field which he would like to put to good use. He has decided to ask for financial support from IMCEC in the form of a 75,000FCFA loan. He is going to buy pepper and tomato seeds and would also like to repair his well to make his farming easier. He is experienced in this field as he has been doing it for more than ten years now.

Ousmane is married and a father. As he is not the only man in the house, he only has to pay a share of the daily expenses. If his income increases, he plans to acquire a motor pump to improve his farming.

loans.use: to buy pepper and tomato seeds and to repair his well.

loans.name: Saliou Dian's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé depuis le 30/05/2007.IL est composé de membres qui sont issus du même village.Elles ont pour activité principale la production de bananes.

Madame AISSATOU en position assise sur la photo à l'extrême gauche et levant la main droite,est la responsable du groupement.Elle est âgée de 36 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 03 enfants dont une fille.L'aîné est âgé de 15 ans tandis-que le plus petit a 07 ans.

Son activité consiste à vendre  de la banane qu'elle revend par la suite.Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité. Elle achéte à chaque marché hebdomadaire 50kg de bananes à 16 500f pour les revendre.

Son objectif est d'assurer la nourriture quotidienne pour ses enfants,accroître son épargne et acheter les fournitures scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on May 30th, 2007. Its members are all from the same village, and their main activity is the production of bananas.

Mrs. AISSATOU is the leader of the group. She is sitting at the far left in the photo, with her right hand raised. She is 36 years old and married with three children aged 7 to 15, one girl and two boys. 

She buys and sells bananas. She has extensive experience in this type of activity. She typically visits the weekly market to buy 50 kg of bananas for 16,500F for resale.

Her goals are to ensure that she can feed her children and buy their school supplies, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy bananas for resale.

loans.name: Sinou Khaly Pc 1 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe crée depuis le cycle un du banc villageois est composé de femmes qui habitent le même village et pratiquant toutes la même activité qu'est le commerce.Elle sont unies par de bonnes relations sociales. Madame Mbène est une femme mariée âgée de 45 ans et mère d'un  enfant .Elle est membre du dit banc depuis sa création et s'active dans le commerce de légumes .Elle est debout à l’extrême droite de la photo habillé en vert un enfant au dos. Mbène dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine d'activité avec son nouveau crédit de 200000 francs CFA elle  va des sacs de légumes ,oignons choux pomme de terres  qu'elle va revendre au détail au niveau du petit marché de son village. les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge ses propres besoins financiers telles que ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois et de payer la nourriture à sa famille.
texts.en: This group, created at the launch of the local banc villageois, is composed of women living in the same village. All of them have the same type of business, working as vendors. They maintain  strong social ties. Mrs. Mbène is 45 years old, married, with one child. She has been a member of the banc villageois since its creation and is a vegetable vendor. In the photo, she is standing on the far right wearing a green outfit and carrying a child on her back. Mbène has plenty of experience in this line of work. With her new loan of 20,000 West African francs she will [buy] bags of vegetables, such as onions, cabbage, and potatoes, and resell them at retail prices at the small market of her village. The revenues from this business will allow her to take care of her own financial needs, saving some money on her banc villageois account, and to pay for her family’s food.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Binta

texts.fr:
La dame Binta, est une commerçante  depuis 5 ans maintenant. Elle s’active dans la vente de produits alimentaires et dispose d’une boutique d’alimentation générale. Elle vient solliciter un crédit de 150000F CFA pour acheter du riz, de l’huile, du lait, des détergents et d’autres produits divers.
Elle commence sa journée à 8h du matin et fini à 17h du soir.
Avec les revenus de son activité, elle réussi à appuyer son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Elle va pouvoir  épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Il aimerait comme projet futur, entamer les travaux de construction de son terrain.
texts.en:
This lady, Binta, has been a trader for the past five years. She sells groceries and has a general grocery store. She has just requested a loan of 150,000FCFA to buy rice, oil, detergents and various other products.

She begins her day at eight o'clock in the morning and finishes at 5 o'clock in the afternoon. With the income from her activity, she manages to help out her husband with the daily household expenses. She will be able to save money and improve her family's nutrition. In the future she would like to begin building on her land.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, milk and sugar to stock up her shop.

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr: Akou est revendeuse d’articles scolaires et des boisons alcoolisées depuis 2009. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et revend dans une boutique à ses clients. Âgée de 26ans, elle est mère d’un enfant qui est scolarisé. Afin d’acheter plus de marchandises, elle sollicite un premier prêt à WAGES.  Son souhait est d’avoir une famille heureuse, bien éduquée et agrandir encore plus son activité.
texts.en: Akou has been a retailer of office supplies and alcoholic beverages since 2009. She gets her supplies from Lomé and sells to her customers in a shop. She is 26 years old and the mother of one child, who is in school. To purchase more merchandise, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES. Her wish is to have a happy, well-educated family and to expand her business some more.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies and beverages to sell

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Essi célibataire de 30ans vit à Lomé. Elle vend dans une boutique des garnitures pour enfants, des mèches et d’autres produits depuis 2005. Pour agrandir son activité, elle sollicite un troisième prêt de WAGES pour acheter des marchandises.(garnitures pour enfant et mèches). Elle désire se marier plus tard et garder son activité  pérenne.
texts.en: Essi is 30 years old, unmarried, and living in Lomé. She has been selling baby supplies, hair extensions, and other products in a shop since 2005. To expand her business, she is requesting a third loan from WAGES to purchase some merchandise (baby supplies and hair extensions). She would like to get married later on and to sustain her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby supplies and hair extensions to sell

loans.name: Médjélawè

texts.fr: Médjélawé est âgée de 30ans. Elle est mariée à un militaire et ils ont 01 enfant de 06 ans qui va à l’école. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle vend il y a 02ans des casseroles et des chaises en plastiques à toutes personnes à domicile. Elle exerce seule son activité et sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Avec les profits, elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer au coté de son mari l’éducation de son enfants.
texts.en: Médjélawé is 30 years old. She is married to a soldier, and they have one child, who is 6 years old and in school. To help out her husband in covering household expenses, she has been selling pots and pans and plastic chairs for two years to anyone, out of her home. She does her work alone and is requesting a second WAGES loan to stock up on merchandise. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business and ensure along with her husband, that her children are educated.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and pots to sell

loans.name: Gérard

texts.fr: Revendeur des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2009, Gérard âgé de 39ans est aidé par sa femme dans l’exécution de ses taches. Afin de rendre son activité pérenne, il vient auprès de WAGES pour avoir un prêt afin d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités tels que  riz, sucre, huile végétale, tomate en boite et autre. A l’avenir, il veut agrandir l’activité et avoir une famille épanouie. Notons  qu’il est père de 02 enfants âgés de 05 et 01an et que seul l’ainé va pour le moment à l’école.
texts.en: A retailer in grocery store 2009, Gérard, aged 39, is helped by his wife in carrying out his tasks. To sustain his business, he is here at WAGES to obtain a loan to purchase basic goods, such as rice, sugar, vegetable oil, canned tomatoes, and more. For the future, he wants to expand his business and have a thriving family. Let us note that he is a father of two children, aged 5 and 1 years old, and the oldest is the only one going to school at the moment.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items for his store

loans.name: El Hadji Barra Sall

texts.fr:
Monsieur El Hadji Barra Sall est un jeune agriculteur qui exerce le métier depuis 10 ans. Il possède un champ ou il fait de la culture maraichère. Il a été pris en photo dans son espace cultural entrain de superviser les lieux. Il est à son 4ème crédit et demande un montant de 500000F CFA pour acheter deux  motos pompes pour son exploitation. Il s’occupe des dépenses quotidiennes du foyer. 
Comme projet futur, il désire exploiter d’autres périmètres agricoles pour maximiser son profit et pouvoir assurer toutes ses charges.
texts.en:
Mr. El Hadji Barra Sall is a young farmer with 10 years of experience. He owns some land, which he uses for market gardening. He is photographed on location supervising his farming activity. 

This is his 4th loan cycle, and he is seeking 500,000F CFA to buy two motorized pumps for his activity. He is responsible for the daily expenses of his household.

In the long term, he wishes to increase his cultivable land to maximize profits and cover all his expenses.

loans.use: to buy two motorized pumps for his farming activity.

loans.name: Awali

texts.fr: Revendeur des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2010, Awali âgé de 38ans exerce seul son activité. Afin de la rendre pérenne, il vient auprès de WAGES pour avoir un premier prêt afin d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités tels que  riz, sucre, huile végétale, tomate en boite et autre. A l’avenir, il veut agrandir l’activité et avoir une famille épanouie. Notons  qu’il est marié à une revendeuse, père d'01 enfant d’un an qui ne fréquente pas pour le moment.
texts.en: Awali, who is aged 38, works alone. He has been selling groceries in a shop since 2010. In order to make it sustainable, he comes to WAGES to request a first loan so as to buy basic stock such as rice, sugar, vegetable oil, tins of tomato and so on. In the future, he wants to expand his business and have a contented family. It should be mentioned that he is married to a saleswoman, and is the father of a child of one that he does not see frequently at present.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.en:
Hamida lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with six children, and five of her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. 

Hamida sells charcoal at the market, selling her products on retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 16 years and works seven days a week.  She has requested for a loan of 400,000 Uganda shillings  from MCDT – SACCO to buy more charcoal bags. 

Hamida's major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are to expand her business so as to serve more customers. She lives in her rented house and the family does not have access to electricity or to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Desire

texts.en:
Desire is 26 years old and is married with 3 children aged between 1 and 6 years old. He owns barber shop and he operates his business from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. every day except on Sunday per week. He currently employs four people to help him, and he has seven years of experience in this work.
